evam jñāna pūrvikā smṛtiḥ

original: tadubhayānugrāhiṇī apohanaśaktiḥ ---- iti tāvat vastusaṃbhavakrameṇa pradarśitam /
analyzed: tad ubhaya anugrāhiṇī apohana śaktiḥ iti tāvat vastu saṃbhava krameṇa pradarśitam
upakrama anusāreṇa smṛtiḥ eva sūcita prasaṅga viparyaya samarthana dṛśā vivecyā
satyam kiṃtu smṛti jñānam
iti hi upakrāntam

original: tatra saṃskāramātrāt tāvat mā nāma udapādi smṛtiḥ ,
analyzed: tatra saṃskāra mātrāt tāvat mā nāma udapādi smṛtiḥ

original: idaṃ tu vaktavyam ---- tathābhūtabhavadabhyupagatabhagavatprabhāvo'pi katham enāṃ kuryāt ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayituṃ smṛtitattvanirūpaṇāya
analyzed: idam tu vaktavyam tathābhūta bhavat abhyupagata bhagavat prabhāvaḥ api katham enām kuryāt iti śaṅkām śamayitum smṛti tattva nirūpaṇāya
sa hi pūrva anubhūta artha upalabdhā
ityādi
arthau bhātaḥ pramātari
ityantam śloka aṣṭakam

original: tatra ślokena svapakṣe smṛtirupapannā ---- iti kathitam /
analyzed: tatra ślokena sva pakṣe smṛtiḥ upapannā iti kathitam
dvitīyena smṛteḥ pūrva anubhava viṣayīkṛta sva lakṣaṇa prakāśana sāmarthyam uktam

original: tṛtīyena anubhavena tadviṣayeṇa ca ekībhāvaparyanta āveśaḥ smaraṇasya uktaḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīyena anubhavena tad viṣayeṇa ca ekībhāva paryantaḥ āveśaḥ smaraṇasya uktaḥ

original: turyeṇa anubhavasya na viṣayatayā smṛtyā prakāśanam ---- iti nirūpitam /
analyzed: turyeṇa anubhavasya na viṣaya tayā smṛtyā prakāśanam iti nirūpitam

original: pañcamena yogijñānamapi anubhavaṃ pṛthagbhāvena na viṣayīkaroti ---- iti baḍatā turyaślokārtha eva upodvalitaḥ /
analyzed: pañcamena yogi jñānam api anubhavam pṛthagbhāvena na viṣayīkaroti iti baḍatā turyaśloka arthaḥ eva upodvalitaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhenāśaṅkyamānam anubhavasya smṛtyā pṛthagviṣayīkaraṇaṃ kākpanikam ---- ityavāstavīkṛtam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhena āśaṅkyamānam anubhavasya smṛtyā pṛthak viṣayīkaraṇam kākpanikam iti avāstavīkṛtam

original: saptamena smṛtiprasaṅgāt vikalpe'pi pūrvānubhavena aikyātmāveśo darśitaḥ /
analyzed: saptamena smṛti prasaṅgāt vikalpe api pūrva anubhavena aikya ātma āveśaḥ darśitaḥ

original: aṣṭamena smartavyasya smṛteḥ smartuśca ekacittattvaviśrāntiḥ uktā ,
analyzed: aṣṭamena smartavyasya smṛteḥ smartuḥ ca ekacit tattva viśrāntiḥ uktā

original: prasaṅgācca dṛśyasya darśanasya draṣṭuśca ---- iti tātparyārthaḥ /
analyzed: prasaṅgāt ca dṛśyasya darśanasya draṣṭuḥ ca iti tātparyārthaḥ
atha krameṇa śloka arthaḥ ucyate
sa hi pūrva anubhūta artha upalabdhā paratas api san
vimṛśan saḥ iti svairī smarati iti apadiśyate

original: pūrvamanubhūtasya arthasya ya upalandhā antarmukho bodhaḥ sa tāvat adyāpi parataḥ smṛtikāle'pi astyeva ,
analyzed: pūrvam anubhūtasya arthasya yaḥ upalandhā antarmukhaḥ bodhaḥ sa tāvat adyā api paratas smṛti kāle api asti eva

original: anubhavasya ca antaḥ artho'pi apṛthagbhāvena avasthitaḥ ---- ityetadapi ayatnasiddham /
analyzed: anubhavasya ca antar arthaḥ api apṛthak bhāvena avasthitaḥ iti etat api ayatna siddham

analyzed: iyat tu cintyam akāla kalite saṃvedane tad antar vartini ca viśvatra bhāva jāte yadi tāvat cit maya tā parāmarśaḥ

original: tat aham iti etāvataiva pūrṇena vimarśena bhāvyam ;
analyzed: tat aham iti etāvatā eva pūrṇena vimarśena bhāvyam
atha idam tayā pṛthak bhāva avabhāsanena
tathā api tatra dvayī gatiḥ
aham iti aṃśe yadi i t antā
tadā aham idam iti sadāśiva ādi daśayā bhāvyam
atha na rohati
tat idam ityeva ābhāsanena bhavitavyam

original: apūrvatābhāsanācca tat anubhavanameva syāt na smaraṇam ---- ityāśaṅgyāha svairī iti /

original: svam ātmīyam upakaraṇam īrayati svakartavyeṣu avaśyaṃ tacchīlaśca ;
analyzed: svam ātmīyam upakaraṇam īrayati sva kartavyeṣu avaśyam tad śīlaḥ ca

original: svaṃ ca ātmānam īrayati na punaḥ svakartavye prerakamapekṣate ---- iti svairī svatantraḥ /
analyzed: svam ca ātmānam īrayati na punar sva kartavye prerakam apekṣate iti svairī svatantraḥ
tena svatantra tvāt saḥ iti vimṛśati

original: sa iti vimarśanasya ca iyadrūpam ---- yat sarvathā akālakalitasvarūpaparāmarśanameva na ,
analyzed: saḥ iti vimarśanasya ca iyat rūpam yat sarvathā akāla kalita sva rūpa parāmarśanam eva na

original: nāpi atyantaṃ bhedena vimarśanameva api tu yo bhāvaḥ pūrvamanubhavakāle taddeśakālapramātrantarasācivyena pṛthakkṛto na ca ahantāyāmeva līnīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: nā api atyantam bhedena vimarśanam eva api tu yaḥ bhāvaḥ pūrvam anubhava kāle tad deśa kāla pramātṛ antara sācivyena pṛthakkṛtaḥ na ca ahantāyām eva līnīkṛtaḥ

original: sa tādṛgeva tamaseva ācchādya avasthāpitaḥ saṃskāraśabdavācyaḥ ,
analyzed: sa tādṛś eva tamasā iva ācchādya avasthāpitaḥ saṃskāra śabda vācyaḥ

original: tatra apahastite sa pūrvavat pṛthakkṛte evāvabhāti /
analyzed: tatra apahastite sa pūrvavat pṛthakkṛte eva avabhāti

original: nanu ca idantayā avabhāset pūrvavadeva , naivam /

original: pūrvakālaparāmarśaḥ iti viruddhapūrvāparaparāmarśasvabhāva eva sa iti parāmarśa ucyate /

analyzed: evam ca saḥ eva parameśvaraḥ smarati

original: etadeva hi tasya smartṛtvam ---- yat evaṃprakāraparāmarśocitakālakalādisparśasahiṣṇumāyāpramātṛbhāvaparigrahaḥ iti māyāvidyādvayādvayamayam

original: tata eva sakalasiddhivitaraṇacaturacintāmaṇiprakhyam āgamikāḥ smaraṇameva mantrādiprāṇitaṃ manyante / tathā ca @-----

iti alam tāvat

original: anena tṛnnantasamāsena yatnato 'nubhavasyārthamukhena kālasparśam arthaviśrāntatāṃ dvayorapi pramātari nirūḍhiṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ darśayati ,

na api dvīkāreṇa
idam iti eva avabhāsana prasaṅgāt

original: ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇābhāve 'pi tu kālābhāsasaṃbhedenaiva svālakṣaṇyaṃ tasya ābhāsasya karoti ,

original: tāvatyeva vā smṛtiḥ ābhāsāntarairapi vyāmiśrā atisphuṭeti /

original: tatra prakāśasya avicitrasya krameṇa vicitratākāraṇaṃ pratibimbātmakaṃ tatpratibimbasajātīyaṃ yat tadeva nīlādirūpaṃ bāhyam ,

original: tathāpi idaṃ nīlamiti pratyakṣeṇa adhyavasāyāt adhyavasāyaprāṇitatvācca pramāṇasthiteḥ pratyakṣavyapadeśyaṃ bhaviṣyati /

na hi abhinnasya bodhasya vicitra ābhāsa hetu tā

original: tasyāpi tatprabodhasya vaicitrye kiṃ nibandhanam // Ipk_1,5.5 //

original: yat punaridaṃ yoginām icchāmātreṇa purasenādivaicitryanirmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam ,
analyzed: yat punar idam yoginām icchā mātreṇa pura senā ādi vaicitrya nirmāṇam dṛṣṭam

original: tatra upādānaṃ prasiddhamṛtkāṣṭha-śukra -- śoṇi -- tādivaicitryamayaṃ na saṃbhavatyeva ,
analyzed: tatra upādānam prasiddha mṛd kāṣṭha śukra śoṇi tā ādi vaicitrya mayam na saṃbhavati eva

original: na hi evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam ---- sarvagatāḥ paramāṇavo yogīcchayā jhaṭiti saṃghaṭitāḥ kāryam ārapsyante iti /
analyzed: na hi evam vaktum śakyam sarvagatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ yogi icchayā jhaṭiti saṃghaṭitāḥ kāryam ārapsyante iti
yat etat loka prasiddha kāraṇa bhāva anatikrama siddhaye nirūpyate

original: na ca etat prasiddham ---- pramāṇubhya eva sthūlaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate iti ,
analyzed: na ca etat prasiddham pramāṇubhyaḥ eva sthūlam ghaṭa ādi jāyate iti
kim tu kapāla ādi vyavadhānena

original: tathāpi niyatasahakārisamavalambanam karacaraṇādivyāpāre viśiṣṭadeśakāladharmādhipatyayogaḥ śikṣābhyāsaprakarṣa iti ,
analyzed: tathā api niyata sahakāri samavalambanam kara caraṇa ādi vyāpāre viśiṣṭa deśa kāla dharma ādhipatya yogaḥ śikṣā abhyāsa prakarṣaḥ iti

original: iyati ca āṃśrīyamāṇe yogī kumbhaṃ nirmimāṇaḥ kumbhakāraprasiddhasanastasāmagrīsanarjanapuraḥsaraṃghaṭaṃ ghaṭayan kumbhakāra eva syāt ,
analyzed: iyati ca āṃśrīyamāṇe yogī kumbham nirmimāṇaḥ kumbhakāra prasiddha sana sta sāmagrī sanarjana puraḥsaram ghaṭam ghaṭayan kumbhakāraḥ eva syāt
tasmāt prasiddha kāraṇa ullaṅghane kim a saṃcetyamāna paramāṇu ādi upādānakāraṇa antara cintayā iti

original: tatra yogisaṃvida eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ ---- yat ābhāsavaicitryarūpam arthajātaṃ prakāśayati iti /
analyzed: tatra yogi saṃvidaḥ eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ yat ābhāsa vaicitrya rūpam artha jātam prakāśayati iti

original: tadasti saṃbhavaḥ ---- yat saṃvit eva abhyupagatasvātantryā apratīdhātalakṣaṇāt icchāviśeṣavaśāt
analyzed: tat asti saṃbhavaḥ yat saṃvid eva abhyupagata svātantryā a pratīdhāta lakṣaṇāt icchā viśeṣa vaśāt

original: saṃvido 'nidhikātmatāyā anapāyāt antaḥsthitameva sat bhāvajātam idamityevaṃ prāṇabuddhidehādeḥ
analyzed: saṃvidaḥ nidhika ātma tāyāḥ anapāyāt antar sthitam eva sat bhāva jātam idam iti evam prāṇa buddhi deha ādeḥ

original: vitīrṇakiyanmātrasaṃvidūpāt svātantryaṃ kiṃ na abhyupagamyate svasaṃvedanasiddham ,
analyzed: vitīrṇa kiyat mātra saṃvid ūpāt svātantryam kim na abhyupagamyate sva saṃvedana siddham
kim iti hetu antara paryeṣaṇā prayāsena khidyate

original: evakāreṇa idamāha ---- sarveṇa tāvat vādinā viṣayavyavasthāpanaṃ saṃvidrūpam anapahnavanīyam ādisiddhaṃ hi tat iti uktam /
analyzed: eva kāreṇa idam āha sarveṇa tāvat vādinā viṣaya vyavasthāpanam saṃvid rūpam anapahnavanīyam ādi siddham hi tat iti uktam

original: tasya ca svātantryameva devaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ cidrūpatvam iti kim aparakāraṇānveṣaṇavyasanitayā /
analyzed: tasya ca svātantryam eva deva śabda nirdiṣṭam cit rūpa tvam iti kim apara kāraṇa anveṣaṇa vyasani tayā

original: hi yasmāt evaṃ prakāśayati deva iti saṃbhāvyate ,
analyzed: hi yasmāt evam prakāśayati deva iti saṃbhāvyate

original: tasmāt kiṃ bāhyena anupapattinā iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ //7//
analyzed: tasmāt kim bāhyena anupapattinā iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ
nanu evam ubhayathā api saṃbhāvanā anumānam unmiṣati

original: tatra kiṃ makurapratibimbitaghaṭādidṛṣṭāntena jñānapratibimbatābhāsavaicitrye vijñānadarpaṇātiriktaṃ tata eva bāhyābhimataṃ hetuṃ kalpayema
analyzed: tatra kim makura pratibimbita ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭāntena jñāna pratibimba tā ābhāsa vaicitrye vijñāna darpaṇa atiriktam tatas eva bāhya abhimatam hetum kalpayema

original: kiṃ vā yogidṛṣṭāntena saṃvitsvātantryameva hetubhāvena brūyāma ?
analyzed: kim vā yogi dṛṣṭāntena saṃvid svātantryam eva hetu bhāvena brūyāma

original: tadidaṃ sāṃśayikaṃ vartate iti āśaṅkya bāhyārthānumānasaṃbhāvanāṃ sūtradvayena apākartumāha @-----
analyzed: tat idam sāṃśayikam vartate iti āśaṅkya bāhya artha anumāna saṃbhāvanām sūtra dvayena apākartum āha
anumānam an ābhāta pūrve na eva iṣṭam indriyam
ābhātam eva bīja ādeḥ ābhāsāt hetu vastunaḥ
ābhāsaḥ punar ābhāsat bāhyasya āsīt kathaṃcana
arthasya nā eva tena asya siddhiḥ nā api anumānataḥ

original: na kevalam anantaraślokanirdiṣṭābhiḥ yuktabhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa bāhyo'rtho na bhāsate ,
analyzed: na kevalam anantara śloka nirdiṣṭābhiḥ yuktabhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa bāhyaḥ ṛthaḥ na bhāsate

original: iyadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ tacca nīlaṃ bhāti iti svaprakāśasaṃvidrūpaṃ nādhikaṃ kiṃcit iti ,
analyzed: iyat eva hi pratyakṣam tat ca nīlam bhāti iti sva prakāśa saṃvid rūpam na adhikam kiṃcid iti

original: yāvat anumānenāpi na asya bāhyāsya siddhiḥ iti apiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat anumānena api na asya bāhyā asya siddhiḥ iti apiśabdasya abhiprāyaḥ

original: tatra anumānam atra naiva pravartitum utsahate /
analyzed: tatra anumānam atra na eva pravartitum utsahate

original: pravṛttamapi na prakṛtasiddhim ādavyāt iti anena sūtradvayena upadarśyate /
analyzed: pravṛttam api na prakṛta siddhim ādavyāt iti anena sūtra dvayena upadarśyate
tatra anumānam vikalpaḥ
sarvaḥ ca ayam vikalpaḥ anubhava mūlaḥ iti prasiddham

original: tena yat sarvathā anābhātapūrvam ananubhūtacaraṃ tatra anumānam anumitivyāpāro vikalpātmā naiva kenacit vādinā iṣyate /
analyzed: tena yat sarvathā an ābhāta pūrvam an anubhūta caram tatra anumānam anumiti vyāpāraḥ vikalpa ātmā nā eva kenacid vādinā iṣyate

original: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣato dṛṣṭe 'numāne saṃkathā iyam ,
analyzed: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭe numāne saṃkathā iyam

original: sāmānyato dṛṣṭe tu kiṃ vakṣyasi yathā arthopalabdhyā indriyānumāne ?
analyzed: sāmānyatas dṛṣṭe tu kim vakṣyasi yathā artha upalabdhyā indriya anumāne

original: ucyate ---- tatrāpi vikalpena yathā so'rthaḥ spṛśyate tathā anumeya iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: ucyate tatra api vikalpena yathā saḥ ṛthaḥ spṛśyate tathā anumeyaḥ iti sthitiḥ

original: vikalpaśca na indriyādikam arthaṃ kenacit saṃniveśaviśeṣādinā viśeṣātmanā spṛśati ,
analyzed: vikalpaḥ ca na indriya ādikam artham kenacid saṃniveśa viśeṣa ādinā viśeṣa ātmanā spṛśati

original: api tu kiṃcidupalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti amunā svabhāvena ,
analyzed: api tu kiṃcid upalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti amunā svabhāvena

original: sa ca svabhāvaḥ kāraṇatālakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣagṛhīta eva /
analyzed: sa ca svabhāvaḥ kāraṇa tā lakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣa gṛhītaḥ eva

original: tathā ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ tantubhyaḥ paṭa ityādau kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhabalena tāvat niśceyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ tantubhyaḥ paṭaḥ ityādau kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratyakṣa anupalambha balena tāvat niśceyaḥ

original: tatra ca pratyakṣaṃ pratyābhāsaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajate ,
analyzed: tatra ca pratyakṣam pratyābhāsam prāmāṇyam bhajate

original: vimarśalakṣaṇasya pramitivyāpārasya ekaikaśabdavācye'rthe pravṛtteḥ tadanusāritvācca pramāṇasya iti vakṣyate /
analyzed: vimarśa lakṣaṇasya pramiti vyāpārasya ekaika śabda vācya ṛthe pravṛtteḥ tad anusāri tvāt ca pramāṇasya iti vakṣyate
eka abhidhāna viṣaye mitiḥ vastuni abādhitā

original: iti / ābhāsamātraṃ ca sāmānyam iti nir.eṣuate /
analyzed: iti ābhāsa mātram ca sāmānyam iti

original: anupalambho'pi anyopalambharūpa ābhāsamātraviśrānta eva iti kāraṇābhāso viśeṣaśūnyaḥ parigṛhīta eva bījāt aṅkura iti pratītau /
analyzed: anupalambhaḥ api anya upalambha rūpaḥ ābhāsa mātra viśrāntaḥ eva iti kāraṇa ābhāsaḥ viśeṣa śūnyaḥ parigṛhītaḥ eva bījāt aṅkuraḥ iti pratītau

original: yat yasya niyamam anuvidhatte avyatiriktam tat tasya kāryam iti pratighaṭaṃ mṛttikādirūpahetutadvanmātrasya āmāsāt //8//
analyzed: yat yasya niyamam anuvidhatte a vyatiriktam tat tasya kāryam iti pratighaṭam mṛttikā ādi rūpa hetu tadvat mātrasya
ābhāsāt bāhyaḥ
sa ca ābhāsate iti vipratiṣiddham

original: anābhāse ca nāsti vikalparūpasya anumānasya vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: anābhāse ca na asti vikalpa rūpasya anumānasya vyāpāraḥ

original: grāmagṛhādestu yat bāhyaṃ tat agrāmādirūpaṃ na ucyate pratyekaṃ vāṭānūpakuṇyatulādeḥ bāhyatvaprasaṅgāt ,
analyzed: grāma gṛha ādeḥ tu yat bāhyam tat a grāma ādi rūpam na ucyate pratyekam vāṭa ānūpa kuṇya tulā ādeḥ bāhya tva prasaṅgāt
api tu tad saṃnikaṭam

original: tasmāt grāmabāhyam ābhāsabāhyam iti ca śabdasāmyamātram etat na vastusāmyam /
analyzed: tasmāt grāma bāhyam ābhāsa bāhyam iti ca śabda sāmya mātram etat na vastu sāmyam

original: evaṃ ye vikalpe vastu na ābhāti iti manyante teṣāmapi tāvat anumānavikalpo na bāhye upapannaḥ /
analyzed: evam ye vikalpe vastu na ābhāti iti manyante teṣām api tāvat anumāna vikalpaḥ na bāhye upapannaḥ

original: asmābhistu upapāditam ---- adhyavasāyasyāpi ābhāsamānaviṣayatvam bhrāntitve cāvasāyasya iti sūtre /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tu upapāditam adhyavasāyasya api ābhāsamāna viṣaya tvam bhrānti tve ca avasāyasya iti sūtre

original: tena anumānavikalpātmanāpi prakāśena yadi anāviṣṭo nīlādiḥ arthaḥ tat na anumita eva syāt /
analyzed: tena anumāna vikalpa ātmanā api prakāśena yadi anāviṣṭaḥ nīla ādiḥ arthaḥ tat na anumitaḥ eva syāt
atha āviṣṭa eva

original: tarhi prāgivārtho 'prakāśaḥ syāt iti nyāyena prakāśamātrasvabhāva eva , na bāhyaḥ /
analyzed: tarhi prāk iva artho prakāśaḥ syāt iti nyāyena prakāśa mātra svabhāvaḥ eva na bāhyaḥ

original: tena bāhye sādhye yat kiṃcit pramāṇam ānīyate ,
analyzed: tena bāhye sādhye yat kiṃcid pramāṇam ānīyate
tat abāhya tām eva pratyuta sādhayati iti viruddham eva
atas eva āha kathaṃcana iti

original: kenāpi prakāreṇa pratyakṣātmanā anumeyātmanā vā ābhāsanam ābhāso bāhyasya anābhāsasya na kadācit abhūt iti ,
analyzed: kena api prakāreṇa pratyakṣa ātmanā anumeya ātmanā vā ābhāsanam ābhāsaḥ bāhyasya anābhāsasya na kadācid abhūt iti

original: tasmāt siddham cidātmaiva hi deva iti //9//
analyzed: tasmāt siddham cit ātmā eva hi devaḥ iti

original: nanu antaḥsthitaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayedityuktaṃ tat antaḥsthitatvam upapādanīyam iti āśaṅkya āha @-----
analyzed: nanu antar sthitam bahis prakāśayet iti uktam tat antar sthita tvam upapādanīyam iti āśaṅkya āha
svāminaḥ ca ātma saṃsthasya bhāva jātasya bhāsanam

original: astyeva na vinā tasmādicchāmarśaḥ pravartate // Ipk_1,5.10 //
analyzed: asti eva na vinā tasmāt icchā āmarśaḥ pravartate
bahis rūpa tayā ābhāsane pi ahantā rūpa tā na truṭyati
pramātṛ aikātmyam āntaryam
iti hi vakṣyate
tat ca sadā eva
prakāśasya pramātṛ tvāt
tad ātma tayā ca vinā prakāśamānasya avastu tvāt

original: kiṃ tu tatra aham iti ucite parāmarśe yo 'yam idantāparāmarśaḥ saiva bāhyatā ,
analyzed: kim tu tatra aham iti ucite parāmarśe yaḥ yam idantā parāmarśaḥ sā eva bāhya tā

original: tacca iha antaḥsthitatvam ahamityetāvatā citsamucitenaiva bapuṣā parāmarśanameva ,
analyzed: tat ca iha antar sthita tvam aham iti etāvatā cit samucitena eva bapuṣā parāmarśanam eva
tat ca iha nīla ādīnām asti eva
na tu na asti iti

original: yadi hi na syāt kumbhakṛto ghaṭaṃ karavāṇi iti ya uttarakriyāmapekṣya icchāśabdavācyaḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
analyzed: yadi hi na syāt kumbha kṛtaḥ ghaṭam karavāṇi iti yaḥ uttara kriyām apekṣya icchā śabda vācyaḥ parāmarśaḥ

original: eṣaṇīyena sa parāmṛśyena aniyantritaḥ cet tataḥ paṭecchāpi sā na kasmāt iti saṃkīryeran vyavahārāḥ /
analyzed: eṣaṇīyena sa parāmṛśyena aniyantritaḥ ced tatas paṭa icchā api sā na kasmāt iti saṃkīryeran vyavahārāḥ

original: atha tatrāpi ca eṣaṇīyaḥ tadānīmeva nirmitaḥ san tathā jātaḥ ,
analyzed: atha tatra api ca eṣaṇīyaḥ tadānīm eva nirmitaḥ san tathā jātaḥ

original: tarhi tannirmāṇaṃ cidātmani vinecchayā nopapannam iti tiṣṭhāsorevamicchaiva hetutā ityatra varṇayiṣyate /
analyzed: tarhi tat nirmāṇam cit ātmani vinā icchayā nā upapannam iti tiṣṭhāsoḥ evam icchā eva hetutā iti atra varṇayiṣyate

original: tacca icchāntaramapi viṣayaniyantritaṃ na vā iti vikalpe 'navasthā /
analyzed: tat ca icchā antaram api viṣaya niyantritam na vā iti vikalpe navasthā
viṣaya niyantritam ced syāt ātma tā eva jātā
na ced ghaṭe paṭa icchā syāt

original: atha tatrāpi tadānīmeva iti kṛtvā anavasthā /
analyzed: atha tatra api tadānīm eva iti kṛtvā anavasthā

original: tasmāt sarvo 'yaṃ bhāvarāśiḥ cidātmani aham ityeva vapuṣā satatāvabhāsuravapuḥ aiśvaryarūpācca
analyzed: tasmāt sarvaḥ yam bhāva rāśiḥ cit ātmani aham iti eva vapuṣā satata avabhāsura vapuḥ aiśvarya rūpāt ca

original: svātantryalakṣaṇāt svāmibhāvāt vicitreṇa vapuṣā kramākramādinā saṃvit enaṃ bahiḥkaroti
analyzed: svātantrya lakṣaṇāt svāmi bhāvāt vicitreṇa vapuṣā kramākrama ādinā saṃvid enam bahiḥkaroti
pramātṛ prathana pūrvakam

original: tatrāpi kvacit ābhāse pramātḥn ekīkaroti nitambanīnṛtta iva prekṣakān /
analyzed: tatra api kvacid ābhāse pramātṝn ekīkaroti nitambanī nṛtte iva prekṣakān
tāvati hi teṣām ābhāse aikyam

original: śarīraprāṇabuddhisukhādyābhāsāṃśeṣu tu bhedasya avigalanāt na sarvathā aikyam /
analyzed: śarīra prāṇa buddhi sukha ādi ābhāsa aṃśeṣu tu bhedasya avigalanāt na sarvathā aikyam

original: ata eva pratikṣaṇaṃ pramātṛsaṃyojanaviyojanavaicitryeṇa parameśvaro viśvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārādinā prapañcayati /
analyzed: atas eva pratikṣaṇam pramātṛ saṃyojana viyojana vaicitryeṇa parameśvaraḥ viśvam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra ādinā prapañcayati
tat uktam ācāryeṇa
sadā sṛṣṭi vinodāya sadā sthiti sukha āsine
sadā tribhuvana āhāra tṛptāya bhavate namaḥ
ityādi śrī bhaṭṭa nārāyaṇena api
muhur muhur aviśrāntaḥ trailokyam kalpanā śataiḥ
kalpayan api kaḥ pi ekaḥ nirvikalpaḥ jayati ajaḥ

original: iti / tasmāt sthitam antaḥsthitaṃ bhāvajātaṃ tena vinā tadviṣayasya parāmarśāyogāt iti //10//
analyzed: iti tasmāt sthitam antar sthitam bhāva jātam tena vinā tad viṣayasya parāmarśa ayogāt iti
nanu parāmarśaḥ nāma vikalpaḥ

original: sa ca avikalpaśuddhasaṃvidvapuṣi bhagavati kathaṃ syāt ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
analyzed: sa ca avikalpa śuddha saṃvid vapuṣi bhagavati katham syāt iti āśaṅkya āha
svabhāvam avabhāsasya vimarśam viduḥ anyathā
prakāśa ūrtha uparaktaḥ api sphaṭika ādi jaḍa upamaḥ
iha avabhāvasya prakāśasya

original: anavabhāsasya ca aprakāśasya ghaṭādeḥ parasparaparihāreṇa dvayoḥ svātmani cet vyavasthānam ,
analyzed: anavabhāsasya ca aprakāśasya ghaṭa ādeḥ paraspara parihāreṇa dvayoḥ sva ātmani ced vyavasthānam

original: tat ghaṭapaṭayoḥ iva idamjaḍam idaṃ jaḍam iti durupapādaṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
analyzed: tat ghaṭa paṭayoḥ iva idam jaḍam idam jaḍam iti durupapādam vailakṣaṇyam
atha avabhāsaḥ yatas rthasya saṃbamdhī
tatas na jaḍaḥ

original: tarhi saṃbandhamātreṇa mṛt api ghaṭasya iti ajaḍā syāt /
analyzed: tarhi saṃbandha mātreṇa mṛd api ghaṭasya iti ajaḍā syāt

original: atha na svasaṃbandhamātram api tu avabhāso 'rthasya prakāśaḥ ,
analyzed: atha na sva saṃbandha mātram api tu avabhāsaḥ rthasya prakāśaḥ

original: tarhi arthātmanā sa prakāśa iti samāpatitam /
analyzed: tarhi arthātmanā sa prakāśaḥ iti samāpatitam

original: na ca anyātmanā anyasya prakāśa upapannaḥ /
analyzed: na ca anya ātmanā anyasya prakāśaḥ upapannaḥ
atha anya svabhāvaḥ pi ghaṭa uvabhāsasya kāraṇam

original: tarhi avabhāso'pi ghaṭasya kāraṇam iti ghaṭo'pi ajaḍaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tarhi avabhāsaḥ api ghaṭasya kāraṇam iti ghaṭaḥ api ajaḍaḥ syāt

original: atha anyena satāpi ghaṭena yato 'vabhāsasya pratibimbarūpā cchāyā dattā ,

original: tathā hi ---- tasmin deśe jñānam -- ācikramiṣā -- ākramaṇam -- ākrāntatājñānam -- prayojanāntarānusaṃdhānam -- tityakṣā -- deśāntarānusaṃdhiḥ
analyzed: tathā hi tasmin deśe jñānam ācikramiṣā ākramaṇam ākrānta tā jñānam prayojana antara anusaṃdhānam tityakṣā deśa antara anusaṃdhiḥ

original: tatrāpi ācikramiṣā ityādinā yojanaviyojanarūpeṇa pratyavamarśena vinābhimatadeśāvāptiḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tatra api ācikramiṣā ityādinā yojana viyojana rūpeṇa pratyavamarśena vinā abhimata deśa avāptiḥ katham bhavet
evam tvarita udgrahaṇa vācana ādau mantavyam
tatra viśeataḥ sthāna karaṇa ākramaṇa ādi yogaḥ

original: atra ca yataḥ paścādbhāvisthūlavikalpakalpanā na saṃvedyate ,
analyzed: atra ca yatas paścāt bhāvi sthūla vikalpa kalpanā na saṃvedyate

original: tata eva tvaritatvam iti sūkṣmeṇa pratyavamarśena saṃvartitaśabdabhāvanāmayena bhāvyameva /
analyzed: tatas eva tvarita tvam iti sūkṣmeṇa pratyavamarśena saṃvartita śabda bhāvanā mayena bhāvyam eva

original: saṃvartitā hi śabdabhāvanā prasāraṇena vivartyamānā sthūlo vikalpaḥ ,
analyzed: saṃvartitā hi śabda bhāvanā prasāraṇena vivartyamānā sthūlaḥ vikalpaḥ

original: yathā idamityasya prasāraṇā ghaṭaḥ śkla ityādiḥ ,
analyzed: yathā idam ityasya prasāraṇā ghaṭaḥ ityādiḥ
tasya api pṛthu budhna udara ākāraḥ śukla tva jāti yukta guṇa samavāyī ityādiḥ

original: dhāvu gatiśuddhau iti pāṭhāt dhāvistvaritagatau svaśaktivaśāt vartata iti //19//
analyzed: dhāvu gati śuddhau iti pāṭhāt dhāviḥ tvarita gatau sva śakti vaśāt vartate iti
bhavatu evam sūkṣmaḥ vimarśaḥ prakāśa śarīra āveśī
yatra tu sthūla tvena vikalpa rūpa tā sphuṭā

original: tatra śabdo nīlādivat eva pṛthak pratibhāsate ---- nīlam idam iti ,
analyzed: tatra śabdaḥ nīla ādi vat eva pṛthak pratibhāsate  nīlam idam iti
sa katham prakāśa svarūpāt apṛthak bhūtaḥ syāt
śabda ātmā ca vimarśaḥ

original: sa ca atra māyātmakaṃ bhedapade 'pi prakāśāpṛthagbhūto bhavadbhiḥ iṣṭaḥ ,
analyzed: sa ca atra māyā ātmakam bheda pade pi prakāśa apṛthak bhūtaḥ bhavadbhiḥ iṣṭaḥ
tat etat katham pratipattavyam iti āśaṅkya āha
ghaṭaḥ yam iti adhyavasā nāma rūpa atirekiṇī
pareśa śaktiḥ ātmā iva bhāsate na tu idantayā

original: kena etat uktam ghaṭa iti yaḥ sthūlaḥ śabdaḥ sa prakāśajīvitasvabhāvo vimarśa iti /
analyzed: kena etat uktam ghaṭaḥ iti yaḥ sthūlaḥ śabdaḥ sa prakāśa jīvita svabhāvaḥ vimarśaḥ iti

original: so'pi hi sthūlaḥ śabdo 'rthavat pṛthagbhūta eva bhāti /
analyzed: saḥ api hi sthūlaḥ śabdaḥ ṛtha vat pṛthak bhūtaḥ eva bhāti

original: tau nāmakarūpalakṣaṇau śabdārthau ekarūpatayā so 'yam ityevaṃrūpatvena parāmṛśantī adhyavasā yā sā parameśvaraśaktiḥ vimarśarūpā ātmavadeva  #
analyzed: tau nāmaka rūpa lakṣaṇau śabda arthau eka rūpa tayā saḥ yam iti evaṃrūpa tvena parāmṛśantī adhyavasā yā sā parameśvara śaktiḥ vimarśa rūpā ātma vat eva  /
aham iti anavacchinna tvena bhāti

original: na tu kadācit idantayā vicchinnatvena bhāti vicchinnatvena avabhāse parapratiṣṭhatvāt punarvimarśāntareṇa bhāvyam ,
analyzed: na tu kadācid idantayā vicchinna tvena bhāti vicchinna tvena avabhāse para pratiṣṭha tvāt punar vimarśa antareṇa bhāvyam

original: tatrāpi evam iti anavasthāto nīlasya prakāśanameva na syāt pratiṣṭhālābhābhāvāt /
analyzed: tatra api evam iti anavasthātaḥ nīlasya prakāśanam eva na syāt pratiṣṭhā lābha abhāvāt

original: tasmāt sarva eva vimarśaḥ prakāśāt avicchinna eva iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva eva vimarśaḥ prakāśāt avicchinna eva iti
adhyavasā iti
ā taḥ ca upasarga īpāḥ vyā
iti aṅ antaḥ striyām

original: nanu evaṃ sarvasyaiva jñānakalāpasya ahamityeva pratiṣṭhāne vedyabhūmisparśo nāsti vedyabhuvi ca deśakālayogaḥ na tu vedakāṃśe ,
analyzed: nanu evam sarvasya eva jñāna kalāpasya aham iti eva pratiṣṭhāne vedya bhūmi sparśaḥ na asti vedya bhuvi ca deśa kāla yogaḥ na tu vedaka aṃśe

original: deśakālayogābhāve ca yat idaṃ jñānāṃ deśāpekṣayā pramātrādyaṃśāpekṣayā ca sakramatvaṃ lakṣyate tat kathaṃ syāt ,
analyzed: deśa kāla yoga abhāve ca yat idam jñānām deśa apekṣayā pramātṛ ādi aṃśa apekṣayā ca sakrama tvam lakṣyate tat katham syāt
krama abhāve ca eka tvam eva vastutas bhavet

original: tataśca jñānasmṛtyādibhistadvān parameśvaraḥ iti yat uktaṃ tat kathaṃ nirvahet ityāśaṅkāṃ śamayan pūrvoktamupasaṃharati @-----
analyzed: tatas ca jñāna smṛti ādibhiḥ tadvān parameśvaraḥ iti yat uktam tat katham nirvahet iti āśaṅkām śamayan pūrva uktam upasaṃharati
kevalam bhinna samvedya deśa kāla anurodhataḥ
jñāna smṛti avasāya ādi sakramam pratibhāsate
satyam evam akramam eva saṃvid tattvam

original: kintu svaśaktivaśāt bhinnatvena bhāsitāni yāni vedyāni teṣāṃ mūrtibhedakṛto yo dūrādūravaitatyāvaitatyādiḥ deśaḥ ,
analyzed: kintu sva śakti vaśāt bhinna tvena bhāsitāni yāni vedyāni teṣām mūrti bheda kṛtaḥ yaḥ dūra adūra vaitatya avaitatya ādiḥ deśaḥ
kriyā bheda kṛtaḥ ca yaḥ cira śīghra krama ādi rūpaḥ kālaḥ
tau anurudhya chāyā mātreṇa abalambya
jñāna smaraṇa adhyavasāyānām sva aṃśāḥ iva bhānti niraṃśānām api
tad bhāsamāna aṃśa kṛtaḥ ca sakrama tva avabhāsaḥ paraspara apekṣayā sva aṃśa apekṣayā ca

original: yadyapi kālakrama eva sphuṭo vijñāneṣu bhāti na deśakramaḥ ,
analyzed: yadi api kāla kramaḥ eva sphuṭaḥ vijñāneṣu bhāti na deśa kramaḥ

original: tathāpi vimūḍhasya parvatasaṃvedanaṃ vitatamiva vadarasaṃvedanaṃ ca sūkṣmamiva bhāti iti deśakramo 'pi darśitaḥ ,
analyzed: tathā api vimūḍhasya parvata saṃvedanam vitatam iva vadara saṃvedanam ca sūkṣmam iva bhāti iti deśa kramaḥ pi darśitaḥ

original: tena vedyagatakramasvīkārābhāsāt sakramatvam ābhāsamānamapi na apāramārthikam ābhāsamānasya parārthatvāt ,
analyzed: tena vedya gata krama svīkāra ābhāsāt sakrama tvam ābhāsamānam api na apāramārthikam ābhāsamānasya parārtha tvāt

original: tataśca yuktamuktam jñānādayo 'sya bhagavataḥ śaktayaḥ iti /
analyzed: tatas ca yuktam uktam jñāna ādayaḥ sya bhagavataḥ śaktayaḥ iti
māyā śaktyā vibhoḥ
iti ślokena svarūpa vaicitryam jñānām darśitam

original: anena tu deśakālavaicitryam iti viśeṣaḥ / iti śivam //21//
analyzed: anena tu deśa kāla vaicitryam iti viśeṣaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃīśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ prathame jñānādhikāre jñānaśaktinirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamāhnikam // 5
analyzed: iti śrīmat ācārya abhinavagupta viracitāyām īśvarapratyabhijñā sūtravimarśinyām prathame jñāna adhikāre jñānaśaktinirūpaṇam nāma pañcama āhnikam
atha ṣaṣṭham āhnikam
sva ātma abheda dhanān bhāvān tad apohana ṭaṅkataḥ
vhindanyaḥ sva icchayā citra rūpa kṛtam stumaḥ śivaḥ
evam smṛti śaktiḥ jñāna śaktiḥ ca nirūpitā

original: atha tadubhayānuprāhiṇī apohanaśaktirvitatya ślokaikādaśakena ahaṃ pratyavamarśo yaḥ prakāśātmā ityādinā siddhe sarvasya jīvataḥ ityantena
analyzed: atha tad ubhaya anuprāhiṇī apohana śaktiḥ vitatya śloka ekādaśakena aham pratyavamarśaḥ yaḥ prakāśa ātmā ityādinā siddhe sarvasya jīvataḥ ityantena

original: tatra ślokena pratyavamarśe avikalpo viśeṣaḥ iti sūcyate /
analyzed: tatra ślokena pratyavamarśe avikalpaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti sūcyate
tatas ślokena śuddhe haṃ pratyavamarśe pohana vyāpāra asaṃbhavaḥ ucyate
tatas sva dṛṣṭau eva tad upapattiḥ iti ślokena
dvayena aśuddhasya aham iti avamarśasya vikalpa rūpa tā
evaṃrūpa anusaṃdhāna ādi rūpam eva parameśvarasya sraṣṭṛ tvam iti ślokena
tatas prakṛte cit ātmani artha avabhāsasya sattā upasaṃhiyate ślokena
tatas dvayena tasmai eva artha avabhāsasya anubhava smaraṇa ādau vaicitryam ucyate
tad uktiḥ ca prakṛtāyām īśvara rūpa sva ātma pratyabhijñāyām upayujyate iti ślokena
iti āhnikasya tātparyārthaḥ
atha grantha arthaḥ vyākhyāyate
uktim idam
vimarśam

original: iti / tatra vimarśo 'bhilāpātmanā śabdena yojita eva ,
analyzed: iti tatra vimarśaḥ bhilāpa ātmanā śabdena yojitaḥ eva

original: tadyojanākṛtaṃ ca vikalparūpatvaṃ śuddhe 'pi parameśvare prāptam ,
analyzed: tad yojanā kṛtam ca vikalpa rūpa tvam śuddhe pi parameśvare prāptam

original: na caitadiṣṭaṃ tasya saṃsārapade māthātmanyupapatteḥ ityāśaṅkyāha @-----
analyzed: na ca etat iṣṭam tasya saṃsāra pade mātha ātmani upapatteḥ iti āśaṅkya āha
ahaṃpratyavamarśaḥ yaḥ prakāśa ātmā api vāc vapuḥ

original: nāsau vikalpaḥ sa hyukto dvayākṣepī viniścayaḥ // Ipk_1,6.1 //
analyzed: na asau vikalpaḥ sa hi uktaḥ dvaya ākṣepī viniścayaḥ

original: prakāśasya śuddhasaṃvidrūpasya dehādisaṃsparśairanāvilībhūtasya yaḥ ātmā jīvitabhūtaḥ
analyzed: prakāśasya śuddha saṃvid rūpasya deha ādi saṃsparśaiḥ anāvilībhūtasya yaḥ ātmā jīvita bhūtaḥ
sāra svabhāvaḥ viccheda śūnyaḥ ntar abhyupagama kalpaḥ

original: aham iti pratyavamarśaḥ asau vikalpo na bhavati /
analyzed: aham iti pratyavamarśaḥ asau vikalpaḥ na bhavati
vikalpa tva āśaṅkāyām bījam darśayati vāc vapuḥ api iti

original: viṣayarūpāt śrotragrāhyāt śabdādanya eva antaravabhāsamānaḥ saṃvidrūpāveśī śabdanātmābhilāpo vāgityanenoktaḥ ---- vakti arthaṃ svādhyāsena  #
analyzed: viṣaya rūpāt śrotra grāhyāt śabdāt anyaḥ eva antar avabhāsamānaḥ saṃvid rūpa āveśī śabdana ātma abhilāpaḥ vāc iti anena uktaḥ vakti artham svādhyāsena
saḥ yam iti abhisaṃdhānena
yadi vāc vapuḥ
kasmāt na vikalpaḥ
āha na hi asya vikalpa lakṣaṇam asti

original: tathā hi ---- vividhā kalpanā vividhatvena ca śaṅkitasya kalpo 'nvavyavacchedanaṃ vikalpaḥ ,
analyzed: tathā hi vividhā kalpanā vividha tvena ca śaṅkitasya kalpaḥ nu avyavacchedanam vikalpaḥ
vividha tvam ca bahnau anagni saṃbhāvanā samāropa nirāse sati bhavat
dvayam vahni avahni rūpam samākṣipati

original: tena vikalpe 'vaśyaṃ tacca niścetavyam atacca apohitavyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tena vikalpe vaśyam tat ca niścetavyam a tat ca apohitavyam bhavati
tathā ca
bhinnayoḥ avabhāsaḥ hi syāt ghaṭa aghaṭayoḥ dvayoḥ
prakāśasya iva na anyasya bhedinaḥ tu avabhāsanam

original: ghaṭe hi dṛṣṭe ghaṭasthāna evāghaṭe 'pi yogyadeśābhimatasthānākramaṇaśīlo vijñānajanakaḥ svakāraṇopanītaḥ saṃbhāvyate paṭādisvabhāvaḥ ,
analyzed: ghaṭe hi dṛṣṭe ghaṭa sthāne eva aghaṭe pi yogya deśa abhimata sthāna ākramaṇa śīlaḥ vijñāna janakaḥ sva kāraṇa upanītaḥ saṃbhāvyate paṭa ādi svabhāvaḥ

original: ato ghaṭāghaṭayordvayoravabhāvasasya saṃbhāvanāt samāropaḥ sāvakāśo bhavati ,
analyzed: atas ghaṭa aghaṭayoḥ dvayoḥ avabhāva sasya saṃbhāvanāt samāropaḥ sa avakāśaḥ bhavati

original: aghaṭasya satyārope niṣedhanalakṣaṇopohanavyāpāraḥ iti tadanuprāṇitā vikalparūpatā ghaṭa ityetasya niścayasya ,
analyzed: aghaṭasya sati ārope niṣedhana lakṣaṇa upohana vyāpāraḥ iti tad anuprāṇitā vikalpa rūpa tā ghaṭaḥ iti etasya niścayasya
liṅ saṃbhāvanāyām

original: yastvayaṃ prakāśo nāma tasya sthāne yaḥ saṃbhāvyate sa tāvadaprakāśarūpo na bhavati tulyakakṣasya hi saṃbhāvanaṃ bhavati ,
analyzed: yaḥ tu ayam prakāśaḥ nāma tasya sthāne yaḥ saṃbhāvyate sa tāvat aprakāśa rūpaḥ na bhavati tulya kakṣasya hi saṃbhāvanam bhavati

original: na ca yatprakāśena kartavyaṃ tadaprakāśasya kadācit dṛṣṭam saṃbhāvanāropaṇādibalādeva ca asyāprakāśarūpatvaṃ vighaṭeta ,
analyzed: na ca yad prakāśena kartavyam tat aprakāśasya kadācid dṛṣṭam saṃbhāvanā āropaṇa ādi balāt eva ca asya aprakāśa rūpa tvam vighaṭeta
atas prakāśa tulyasya anyasya aprakāśa rūpasya bhedinaḥ tad tulya kakṣyasya apohana ātmaka bhedana vyāpāra asāhiṣṇoḥ avabhāsanam eva nā asti
tad abhāve kasya apoṣṭhanam
avabhāsa saṃbhave pi prakāśa rūpa tvam eva

original: na ca prakāśasya svarūpadeśakālabhedo yena dvitīyaḥ prakāśa ekasmādapohyeteti /
analyzed: na ca prakāśasya sva rūpa deśa kāla bhedaḥ yena dvitīyaḥ prakāśaḥ ekasmāt apohyeta iti

original: hīti , yasmādevaṃ tato dvayābhāvādpohāsaṃbhave vikalparūpatvābhāvāt cinmātre parāmarśātmani ahamiti pratyavamarśa eva ,
analyzed: hi iti yasmāt evam tatas dvaya abhāvāt poha asaṃbhave vikalpa rūpa tva abhāvāt cit mātre parāmarśa ātmani aham iti pratyavamarśaḥ eva
na tu vikalpaḥ

original: nanu ghaṭe pariniṣthitarūpe dṛṣṭe taddarśanamupajīvatā vikalpena kathamaghaṭasya niṣedhanaṃ kriyate ,
analyzed: nanu ghaṭe pariniṣthita rūpe dṛṣṭe tad darśanam upajīvatā vikalpena katham aghaṭasya niṣedhanam kriyate
na hi a ghaṭasya kenacid nāma api gṛhītam
aghaṭa vāsanā api ghaṭe dṛṣṭe kathaṃkāram prabudhyatām

original: satyam , evaṃ śākyaḥ paryanuyojyo na tu vayam , yataḥ
analyzed: satyam evam śākyaḥ paryanuyojyaḥ na tu vayam yatas
tad a tad pratibhā bhājā mātrā eva a tad vyapohanāt

original: tanniścayanamukto hi vikalpo ghaṭa ityayam // Ipk_1,6.3 //
analyzed: tat niścayana muktaḥ hi vikalpaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ayam

original: iha pramātā nāma pramāṇādatiriktaḥ pramāsu svatantraḥ saṃyojanaviyojanādyādhānavaśāt kartā darśitaḥ ,
analyzed: iha pramātā nāma pramāṇāt atiriktaḥ pramāsu svatantraḥ saṃyojana viyojana ādi ādhāna vaśāt kartā darśitaḥ
tasya ca pramātuḥ antar sarva artha avabhāsaḥ
cit mātra śarīrā u pi tad sāmānādhikaraṇya vṛttiḥ api darpaṇa nagara nyāyena asti iti api uktam
evam ca tad pratibhām ghaṭa ābhāsam

original: atatpratibhāṃ ca aghaṭābhāsaṃ pramātā bhajate ---- sevate tāvat ,
analyzed: a tad pratibhām ca a ghaṭa ābhāsam pramātā bhajate sevate tāvat

original: tadavikalpadaśāyāṃ citsvabhāvo 'sau ghaṭaḥ cidvadeva viśvaśarīraḥ pūrṇaḥ ,
analyzed: tad avikalpa daśāyām cit svabhāvaḥ sau ghaṭaḥ cit vat eva viśva śarīraḥ pūrṇaḥ
na ca tena kaścid vyavahāraḥ
tat māyā vyāpāram ukkāsayan pūrṇam api khaṇḍayati bhāvam
tena a ghaṭasya ātmanaḥ paṭa ādeḥ ca apohanam kriyate niṣedhana rūpam

original: tadeva vyapohanamāśritya tasma ghaṭasya niścayanamucyate ghaṭa eva iti ,
analyzed: tat eva vyapohanam āśritya ghaṭasya niścayanam ucyate ghaṭaḥ eva iti
eva arthasya saṃbhāvyamāna apara vastu niṣedha rūpa tvāt
eṣaḥ eva paritas chedāt takṣaṇa kalpāt paricchedaḥ
hi iti yatas evam

original: tasmāt yuktaṃ dvayākṣepī vikalpaḥ iti pūrvaślokoltena vastudvayena hetū krameṇoktau
analyzed: tasmāt yuktam dvaya ākṣepī vikalpaḥ iti pūrva śloka ultena vastu dvayena hetū krameṇa uktau

original: yasmādevaṃ vikalpaḥ tato 'hamiti śuddho vimarśaḥ na vikalpaḥ ---- iti ślokatraye mahāvākyārthaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt evam vikalpaḥ tatas ham iti śuddhaḥ vimarśaḥ na vikalpaḥ iti śloka traye mahāvākya arthaḥ

original: śākyairapi pramāturevāyaṃ vyāpāra uktaḥ ekaḥ pratyavamarśākhyaḥ ityatra prapattā iti svayam iti ca vadadbhiḥ ,
analyzed: śākyaiḥ api pramātuḥ eva ayam vyāpāraḥ uktaḥ ekaḥ pratyavamarśa ākhyaḥ iti atra prapattā iti svayam iti ca vadadbhiḥ
sa tu etaiḥ katham samarthyaḥ iti āstām etat
nanu evam aham iti api pratyavamarśe na ahaṃrūpasya ghaṭa ādeḥ

original: pohanīyasyāpohe vikalparūpatā kathaṃ na syāt ityāśayenāha @-----
analyzed: pohanīyasya apohe vikalpa rūpa tā katham na syāt iti āśayena āha

original: cittattvaṃ māyayā hitvā bhinna evāvabhāti yaḥ /
analyzed: cit tattvam māyayā hitvā bhinnaḥ evā avabhāti yaḥ

original: dehe buddhāvatha prāṇe kalpite nabhasīva vā // Ipk_1,6.4 //
analyzed: dehe buddhau atha prāṇe kalpite nabhasi iva vā
pramātṛ tvena aham iti vimarśaḥ nya vyapohanāt
vikalpaḥ eva sa para pratiyogi avabhāsa jaḥ
aham iti avamarśaḥ dvidhā śuddhaḥ māyīyaḥ ca

original: tatra śuddho yaḥ saṃvinmātre viśvābhinne viśvacchāyācchuritācchātmani vā /

analyzed: tatas eva smaraṇa kāla asaṃbhavī ābhāsaḥ tad anubhava pūrva kāla kalitaḥ eva iti svayam smaraṇa ādeḥ nirviṣaya tvam gṛhīta grāhi tvam ca
etat eva asphuṭa tvam

original: iti siddho 'nubhavasmaraṇādau ābhāsabhedaḥ antarābhāsavargasya bahirābhāsanam anyāvyavadhānena sphuṭatā ,
analyzed: iti siddhaḥ nubhava smaraṇa ādau ābhāsa bhedaḥ antara ābhāsa vargasya bahis ābhāsanam anya a vyavadhānena sphuṭatā
vyavadhānena tu tātkālika tva abhāvāt asphuṭatā iti

original: nanu anubhavajñānāt aindriyakāt anyat sarvaṃ jñānaṃ vyavadhānena bahirābhāsanarūpaṃ prāptam ityāśaṅkya pravibhāgamāha @-----
analyzed: nanu anubhava jñānāt aindriyakāt anyat sarvam jñānam vyavadhānena bahis ābhāsana rūpam prāptam iti āśaṅkya pravibhāgam āha
sa naisargikaḥ evā asti vikalpe svaira cāriṇi
yathā abhimata saṃsthāna ābhāsanāt buddhi gocare

original: yaḥ pratyakṣavyāpāram anupajīvan vyākṣepasāratayā manorājyasaṅkalpādivikalpaḥ sa svaraṃ kṛtvā svapreraṇena prapreraṇanairapekṣyeṇa svātantryeṇa  #
analyzed: yaḥ pratyakṣa vyāpāram an upajīvan vyākṣepa sāra tayā manaḥ rājya saṅkalpa ādi vikalpaḥ sa svaram kṛtvā sva preraṇena prapreraṇa nairapekṣyeṇa svātantryeṇa
carati udeti vyayate ca

original: tatra yo bahirābhāso nīlādeḥ antarābhāsamayasya sa naisargika eva ,
analyzed: tatra yaḥ bahis ābhāsaḥ nīla ādeḥ antar ābhāsa mayasya sa naisargikaḥ eva

original: tathā hi aparidṛṣṭapūrvamapi śvetaṃ daśanaśatakalotakarayugalayuktaṃ dantinam antaḥ

original: pramātṛbhūmau sthitaṃ bahiḥ antaḥkaraṇabhūmau svacchadhīdarpaṇātmikāyāṃ sa vikalpaḥ
analyzed: pramātṛ bhūmau sthitam bahis antaḥkaraṇa bhūmau svaccha dhī darpaṇa ātmikāyām sa vikalpaḥ

asmāt ca antar ābhāsa saṃbhava samarthana prasaṅga āgatāt ābhāsa bheda vicārāt śāstre yat

atas eva yathā abhīṣṭa samullekha avabhāsanāt

original: pratibhāti ghaṭaḥ iti yadyapi viṣayopaśliṣṭameva pratibhānaṃ bhāti tathāpi na tadviṣayasya svakaṃ vapuḥ ,
analyzed: pratibhāti ghaṭaḥ iti yadi api viṣaya upaśliṣṭam eva pratibhānam bhāti tathā api na tat viṣayasya svakam vapuḥ

original: api tu saṃvedanameva tat tathā cakāsti māṃ prati bhāti iti pramātṛlagnatvāt /
analyzed: api tu saṃvedanam eva tat tathā cakāsti mām prati bhāti iti pramātṛ lagna tvāt

original: {tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti /}

original: iti / śatrā aviratasphuraṇatvaṃ karmapravacanīyena tadīyasvātantryopakalpitanirmāṇakriyājanito vedyavedakabhāvarūpo lakṣaṇātmā saṃbandho dyotitaḥ
analyzed: iti śatrā avirata sphuraṇa tvam karmapravacanīyena tadīya svātantrya upakalpita nirmāṇa kriyā janitaḥ vedya vedaka bhāva rūpaḥ lakṣaṇa ātmā saṃbandhaḥ dyotitaḥ
kevalam viṣaya ullekhana balāt bahis krama avabhāsaḥ samarthitaḥ

original: sa sa kramayaugapadyādivicitrarūpo yaḥ padārthānāṃ vakṣyamāṇeśvarasvātantryarūpadeśakālaśaktyupakalpitaḥ kramaḥ deśakālaparipāṭī ,
analyzed: sa sa krama yaugapadya ādi vicitra rūpaḥ yaḥ padārthānām vakṣyamāṇa īśvara svātantrya rūpa deśa kāla śakti upakalpitaḥ kramaḥ deśa kāla paripāṭī
tena rūṣitā pratibimba kalpa tayā uparaktā
yā pratibhā uktā
kevalam bhinna saṃvedya

original: ityādinā / eṣā iti ca sarvasya svakāśarūpā ,
analyzed: ityādinā eṣā iti ca sarvasya svakāśa rūpā
paramārthataḥ ca antarmukha tvena prakāśa mātra paramārtha tayā bheda abhāvāt akramā
saḥ eva maheśvaraḥ

original: avidyamāno 'ntaḥ paricchedo deśataḥ kālataḥ svarūpataśca yasyāḥ cittaḥ saṃvidaḥ tadeva rūpaṃ yasya iti ,
analyzed: a vidyamānaḥ ntaḥ paricchedaḥ deśataḥ kālataḥ svarūpataḥ ca yasyāḥ cittaḥ saṃvidaḥ tat eva rūpam yasya iti

original: ata eva bahirmukhaprakāśātmakavijñānasvabhāvasya pramāṇavargasya yo 'ntaḥ pratyābhāsam idam idam iti ananta ---- kalpaḥ vikalpamayo vimarśātmā  #

pramā samūhaḥ
tatra saṃyojana viyojana viśrama ādi rūpa aneka prakāra svātantrya paripūrṇaḥ śuddha ahaṃpratyavamarśa mayaḥ pramātā sa bhaṇyate

original: ataśca bahirghaṭaprakāśaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ iti antarvikalpaḥ svīkṛtapūrvarūpaḥ aham iti tadubhayaviśrāntisthānam ,
analyzed: atas ca bahis ghaṭa prakāśaḥ ayam ghaṭaḥ iti antar vikalpaḥ svīkṛta pūrva rūpaḥ aham iti tad ubhaya viśrānti sthānam
iti iyat pūrṇam prakāśasya svarūpam
atra eva upapattim pradarśayitum anvayam tāvat āha
tad tad vibhinna saṃvitti mukhaiḥ eka pramātari
pratitiṣṭhatsu bhāveṣu jñāteyam upapadyate

original: saṃvinniṣṭhā hi viṣayavyavasthitayaḥ iti yat ucyate tat na bhinnarūpaprakātmakasaṃvinmātraviśrāntyā
analyzed: saṃvid niṣṭhāḥ hi viṣaya vyavasthitayaḥ iti yat ucyate tat na bhinna rūpa prakā ātmaka saṃvid mātra viśrāntyā

original: siddhyati api tu tāstā vibhinnāḥ saṃvido niścayarūpāḥ pramātmāno yāḥ tāni eva mukhāni
analyzed: siddhyati api tu tāḥ tāḥ vibhinnāḥ saṃvidaḥ niścaya rūpāḥ pramā ātmānaḥ yāḥ tāni eva mukhāni

original: dvārāṇi upāyā mārgāḥ taiḥ mukhaiḥ nadīsrotaḥsthānīyaiḥ yadi amī bhāvā nīlasukhādaya
analyzed: dvārāṇi upāyāḥ mārgāḥ taiḥ mukhaiḥ nadī srotaḥ sthānīyaiḥ yadi amī bhāvāḥ nīla sukha ādaya

original: uhyamānā ekasmin aham iti pramātṛrūpe mahāsaṃvitsamudre pratitiṣṭhanti ābhimukhyena
analyzed: uhyamānāḥ ekasmin aham iti pramātṛ rūpe mahā saṃvid samudre pratitiṣṭhanti ābhimukhyena
viśrāntim bhajante

original: tata eṣu parasparaṃ samanvayarūpaṃ tat jñāteyaṃ tat upapattyā ghaṭate ,
analyzed: tatas eṣu parasparam samanvaya rūpam tat jñāteyam tat upapattyā ghaṭate

original: jñātīnāṃ bhāvaḥ tacchabdapravṛttinimittaṃ parasparaṃ jānīyuḥ iti ,

karma ca anyonya yogakṣema udvahana ātmakam jñāteyam

original: na jaḍānāṃ svataḥ samanvayaḥ kadācidapi iti pratipādayitum //2//

deśa kāla krama juṣām arthānām sva samāpinām
sakṛt ābhāsa sādhyaḥ asau anyathā kaḥ samanvayaḥ
arthānām jaḍānām

original: tajjñānāṃ tadvikalpānāṃ tanniścayānāṃ ca deśakramaṃ kālakramaṃ cātyajatām ,

sva samāpinām sva rūpa mātra pratiṣṭhānām
kaḥ samanvayaḥ
na kaścid iti arthaḥ

original: yato hi asau samanvayaḥ sakṛdābhāsena deśakālākāramiśrīkaraṇātmanā yojanābhāsena sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ nānyathā ,
analyzed: yatas hi asau samanvayaḥ sakṛt ābhāsena deśa kāla ākāra miśrīkaraṇa ātmanā yojana ābhāsena sādhayitum śakyaḥ na anyathā

original: na hi pṛthakpṛthak parikṣīṇeṣu srotaḥsu taduhyamānāḥ tṛṇolapādayaḥ samanvayaṃ kaṃcit yānti iti /
analyzed: na hi pṛthak pṛthak parikṣīṇeṣu srotaḥsu tad uhyamānāḥ tṛṇa ulapa ādayaḥ samanvayam kaṃcid yānti iti

original: anekatvena deśakālādibheda ityāśayena sakṛcchabdaḥ tanniṣedhatātparyeṇa prayuktaḥ //3//
analyzed: aneka tvena deśa kāla ādi bhedaḥ iti āśayena sakṛt śabdaḥ tad niṣedha tātparyeṇa prayuktaḥ

original: tatra ko 'sau samanvaya ityāśaṅkya bahutaravyāpakaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ tāvat darśayati @-----
analyzed: tatra kaḥ sau samanvayaḥ iti āśaṅkya bahutara vyāpakam kārya kāraṇa bhāvam tāvat darśayati
pratyakṣa anupalambhānām tad tad bhinna aṃśa pātinām
iha anubhūtaḥ viṣayaḥ prakāśate smṛtau

original: tatra viṣayasyāsau smṛtiḥ na nūtanaḥ prakāśaḥ api tu asya sa prakāśaḥ prācyo 'nubhava eva ,
analyzed: tatra viṣayasya asau smṛtiḥ na nūtanaḥ prakāśaḥ api tu asya sa prakāśaḥ prācyaḥ nubhavaḥ eva

original: sa cānubhavo jñānarūpatvena jñeyarūpatvābhāvāt na jñānāntarasaṃvedyaḥ api tu svaprakāśaḥ ,
analyzed: sa ca anubhavaḥ jñāna rūpa tvena jñeya rūpa tva abhāvāt na jñāna antara saṃvedyaḥ api tu sva prakāśaḥ

original: sa ca smṛtikāle yadi asan tat kathaṃ prakāśatām ,
analyzed: sa ca smṛti kāle yadi asān tat katham prakāśatām

original: bhavatu vā asau tathāpi smṛtiḥ syāt ,
analyzed: bhavatu vai asau tathā api smṛtiḥ syāt
tasmāt etat evam upapadyate
yat eva smṛti sva saṃvedanam
tat eva anubhavasya sva saṃvedanam

original: na tu aparaṃ svasaṃvedanavyatiriktaṃ pratyakṣam anumānādikaṃ vā tatra kramate ,
analyzed: na tu aparam sva saṃvedana vyatiriktam pratyakṣam anumāna ādikam vā tatra kramate

original: tataśca tāvatkālāpi avichinnamekaṃ yat svasaṃvedanaṃ tadeva pramātṛttvam iti siddham /
analyzed: tatas ca tāvatkālā api avichinnam ekam yat sva saṃvedanam tat eva pramātṛ ttvam iti siddham

original: anyatra anubhavitari smartā anyo na upapadyate ,
analyzed: anyatra anubhavitari smartā anyaḥ na upapadyate
iti anayā chāyayā smṛtyā pramātṛ siddhiḥ pūrvam uktā

original: bādhābhāve tat kathaṃ syād ityāśaṅkya so 'pi ayaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ satyāsatyapravibhājanayā
analyzed: bādhā abhāve tat katham syāt iti āśaṅkya saḥ u pi ayam bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ satya asatya pravibhājanayā

original: viśveṣāṃ vyavahārāṇāṃ jīvitabhūto na ekena pramātṛtattvena vinā ghaṭata iti vitatya darśayati @-----
analyzed: viśveṣām vyavahārāṇām jīvita bhūtaḥ naḥ ekena pramātṛ tattvena vinā ghaṭate iti vitatya darśayati
bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ api sva ātma niṣṭhā virodhinām
jñānānām udiyāt eka pramātṛ pariniṣṭhiteḥ

original: bādhābhāve prāmāṇyam ityetadartham avaśyasamarthyo yo bādhavyavahāraḥ so 'pi katham iti api śabdasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: bādhā abhāve prāmāṇyam iti etad artham avaśya samarthyaḥ yaḥ bādha vyavahāraḥ saḥ u pi katham iti api śabdasya arthaḥ

original: iha śuktyā tāvat rajatasya na kācit bādhā nāma kriyamāṇā dṛśyate ,
analyzed: iha śuktyā tāvat rajatasya na kācid bādhā nāma kriyamāṇā dṛśyate

original: śuktijñānena rajatajñānaṃ bādhyate ityapi na yuktam ,
analyzed: śukti jñānena rajata jñānam bādhyate iti api na yuktam

original: svasmin viṣaye ātmani ca svarūpe dvayoḥ jñānayoḥ pariniṣṭhitayoḥ viśr/
analyzed: svasmin viṣaye ātmani ca svarūpe dvayoḥ jñānayoḥ pariniṣṭhitayoḥ viśrānti
antayoḥ anyonyam virodhasya abhāvāt

original: atha ayaṃ parasparaparihāra eva virodhaḥ tarhi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ virodhāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasya svātmani pariniṣṭhaiva na labhyeti sutarāṃ  #
analyzed: atha ayam paraspara parihāraḥ eva virodhaḥ tarhi sarveṣām jñānānām virodhāt bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya svātmani pariniṣṭhā eva na labhyā iti sutarām
vighaṭeta satya itara pravibhāgaḥ
nañ api atra tantreṇa vyākhyeyaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yadi jñānaṃ svayaṃ naśyati tadā kiṃ jñānāntareṇa asya kṛtam ,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yadi jñānam svayam naśyati tadā kim jñāna antareṇa asya kṛtam

original: na hi tena tatkāle 'saṃbhavatā tasya viṣayāpahāraḥ kartuṃ śakyaḥ ,
analyzed: na hi tena tad kāle saṃbhavatā tasya viṣaya apahāraḥ kartum śakyaḥ

original: na rājatam ityapi jñānaṃ svaṃ rajatābhāvaṃ viṣayīkurvat na viṣayam apaharet rajatajñānasya /
analyzed: na rājatam iti api jñānam svam rajata abhāvam viṣayīkurvat na viṣayam apaharet rajata jñānasya
atha api jñāna antareṇa nāśyate iti api pakṣaḥ

original: tatrāpi sarveṣāṃ jñānām iyameva saraṇiriti kiṃcideva bādhyam iti kathaṃ syāt ?
analyzed: tatra api sarveṣām jñānām iyam eva saraṇiḥ iti kiṃcid eva bādhyam iti katham syāt

original: yadā tu rajatajñānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ ca ekatra svasaṃvedane viśrānyataḥ tadā etat upapadyate ,
analyzed: yadā tu rajata jñānam śukti jñānam ca ekatra sva saṃvedane viśrānyataḥ tadā etat upapadyate

original: tathā hi ---- ekatrāpi pramātṛtattve viśrāmyatāṃ jñānānāṃ naikaprakāraiva viśrāntiḥ api tu vicitratayaiva sā saṃvedyate ,
analyzed: tathā hi ekatra api pramātṛ tattve viśrāmyatām jñānānām nā eka prakārā eva viśrāntiḥ api tu vicitra tayā eva sā saṃvedyate

original: tathā hi ---- nīlam iti utpalam iti jñāne pramātari viśrāmyantī parasparoparāgābhāsena viśrāmyataḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi nīlam iti utpalam iti jñāne pramātari viśrāmyantī paraspara uparāga ābhāsena viśrāmyataḥ
ghaṭaḥ iti paṭaḥ iti paraspara an āśkeṣeṇa

original: śuktikā iti na rajatam iti vā jñānaṃ rajatam iti jñānasya unmūlanaṃ tadīyavimarśātmakapramārūpavyāpārānuvartanavidhvaṃsaṃ kurvat pramātari  #
analyzed: śuktikā iti na rajatam iti vā jñānam rajatam iti jñānasya unmūlanam tadīya vimarśa ātmaka pramā rūpa vyāpāra anuvartana vidhvaṃsam kurvat pramātari
pratiṣṭhām bhajate

original: evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādau viśrāntivaicitryaṃ prameyāsaṃbhavi pramātrā svātantryeṇa nirmitaṃ tata eva asya pramāsvatantratādāyi vācyam /
analyzed: evam kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādau viśrānti vaicitryam prameya asaṃbhavi pramātrā svātantryeṇa nirmitam tatas eva asya pramā svatantra tā dāyi vācyam

original: evamekatra pramātari pūrvajñānasya parivarjanena yato niścitā sthitiḥ ,
analyzed: evam ekatra pramātari pūrva jñānasya parivarjanena yatas niścitā sthitiḥ
iti bādhya bādhaka vyavahāraḥ upapannaḥ

original: nīlādivat kila tānapi vyavahārān sa eva parameśvaraḥ svātantryāt ābhāsayati tat te 'pi satyā eveti //6//
analyzed: nīla ādi vat kila tān api vyavahārān saḥ eva parameśvaraḥ svātantryāt ābhāsayati tat te satyāḥ eva iti
atra parakīyam matam āśaṅkate dūṣayiṣyāmi iti
vivikta bhū tala jñānam ghaṭa abhāva matiḥ yathā
tathā ced śuktikā jñānam rūpya jñāna apramā tva vid

original: iha śuktikājñānaṃ svātmānaṃ saṃvidat svātmābhinnaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ budhyate ,
analyzed: iha śuktikā jñānam sva ātmānam saṃvidat sva ātma abhinnam pramāṇa tvam budhyate
tat paricchinatti iti nyāyāt

original: tatparicchedanāntarīyakaśca anyavyavaccheda ityaśuktijñānarūpasya rajatajñānasya apramāṇatvavedanaṃ tadeva ucyate yat etat śuktikāsaṃvedanābhinnapramāṇatvavedanam
analyzed: tad pariccheda nāntarīyakaḥ ca anya vyavacchedaḥ iti a śukti jñāna rūpasya rajata jñānasya apramāṇa tva vedanam tat eva ucyate yat etat śuktikā saṃvedana abhinna pramāṇa tva vedanam

original: na ca etat apūrvaṃ yat vastvantarajñānameva vastvantarābhāvajñānam iti ,
analyzed: na ca etat apūrvam yat vastu antara jñānam eva vastu antara abhāva jñānam iti
śuddha bhū bhāga grahaṇam eva hi ghaṭa abhāva grahaṇam iti prasiddham etat
evam apramāṇa tva saṃvedanam eva rajata jñānasya bādhya tvam ucyate

original: ataśca bādhyabādhakatvam evaṃ siddham iti cet asmābhiḥ ucyate ---- tat kiṃ pramātraikyeneti //7//
analyzed: atas ca bādhya bādhaka tvam evam siddham iti ced asmābhiḥ ucyate tat kim pramātṛ aikyena iti

original: atra prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya siddhau tattvamupapādayiṣyan dṛṣṭāntameva tāvat paradarśane dūṣayati @-----
analyzed: atra prasaṅgāt abhāva vyavahārasya siddhau tattvam upapādayiṣyan dṛṣṭāntam eva tāvat para darśane dūṣayati
nā evam śuddha sthala jñānāt siddhyet tasya a ghaṭa ātmanā

original: yo dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ sa eva na ,
analyzed: yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ uktaḥ saḥ eva na

original: kuta iti cet ucyate iha bhūtalaṃ na ghaṭaḥ iti tādātmyena abhāvo vyavahartavyaḥ kadācit ,

original: kadācit vyatirekeṇa iha bhūtale ghaṭo na iti /
analyzed: kadācid vyatirekeṇa iha bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na iti
tatra śuddha bhū tala jñānāt ādyaḥ yam vyavahāraḥ sidhyati
yatra dṛśya tvam na upayogi

original: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirapi hi yasya nāsti piśācādeḥ svabhāvabalāt ,

yasya vā śabda ādeḥ tad gāhaka śrotra ādi sāmagrī sākalyasya tatra eka jñāna saṃsargi vastu antara pratipatti abhāvena aniścayāt

original: tasyāpi tādātmyenāyamabhāvo gṛhyate bhūtalaṃ na piśāco na śabdaḥ iti ,

original: yatra tu dṛśyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam avaśyam apayogi tatra vyatirekeṇa abhāve vyavahartavye na eṣo 'bhyupāyaḥ //8//
analyzed: yatra tu dṛśya tvam viśeṣaṇam avaśyam apayogi tatra vyatirekeṇa abhāve vyavahartavye na eṣaḥ bhyupāyaḥ
kutas iti ced ati aprasaṅgāt iti brūmaḥ

viviktam bhū talam śaśvat bhāvānām sva ātma niṣṭhiteḥ

original: iti satyapi ghaṭe katham abhāvo vyatirekeṇa na vyavahriyate atra bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti iti ,

original: nanvevaṃ vyatirekābhāvaniṣṭho vyavahāro loke tāvat avigītaḥ asyāṃcideva daśāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ ,

original: tatra kā gatirityāśaṅkya cirantanairaparidṛṣṭaṃ tatsiddhiprakāraṃ darśayati @-----
analyzed: tatra kā gatiḥ iti āśaṅkya cirantanaiḥ a paridṛṣṭam tad siddhi prakāram darśayati

original: iha bhāva eva bhāvāntarasya abhāva iti vyavahartavyaḥ iti ayaṃ tāvat aparityājyaḥ prātītikaḥ panthāḥ ,
analyzed: iha bhāvaḥ eva bhāva antarasya abhāvaḥ iti vyavahartavyaḥ iti ayam tāvat a parityājyaḥ prātītikaḥ panthāḥ

original: tatra bhāvasya bhāvāntareṇa ya ādhāryādhārabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvatadabhāvayoḥ ,

original: tataśca bhūtale ghaṭavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaraṃ śilādikam ālokapuñjādikaṃ vā yat cākṣuṣe jñāne bhāti tadeva vyavahriyate bhūtale ghaṭābhāvaḥ
analyzed: tatas ca bhū tale ghaṭa vyatiriktam vastu antaram śilā ādikam āloka puñja ādikam vā yat cākṣuṣe jñāne bhāti tat eva vyavahriyate bhū tale ghaṭa abhāvaḥ
bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vā

original: yatrāpi nāsti cakṣurvyāpāro netranimīlanasaṃtamasādau tatrāpi bhūtale ghaṭocitakaṭhinasparśaviviktaṃ
analyzed: yatra api nā asti cakṣuḥ vyāpāraḥ netra nimīlana saṃtamasa ādau tatra api bhū tale ghaṭa ucita kaṭhina sparśa viviktam

original: mṛdum uṣṇaṃ śītam anuṣṇāśītaṃ vā gṛhṇan tameva atra ghaṭābhāva iti vyavaharati vāyusparśasya
analyzed: mṛdum uṣṇam śītam anuṣṇa aśītam vā gṛhṇan tam eva atra ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti vyavaharati vāyu sparśasya

iti vākya arthaḥ

original: āntaraprāṇaspandanajanitasūkṣmaśabdākarṇanācca śrotrādisākalyaṃ saṃbhavāyamānaḥ tameva śabdam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇaṃ śṛṇvan śabdāntaraṃ niṣedhayati  #

na iha anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: rasagandhasparśābhāvo 'pi dantodakarasaṃ tripuṭikāgandhaṃ kāyīyaṃ ca sparśaṃ saṃvedayamānenaiva rasābhāvo vedyaḥ ,

na hi eka jñāna saṃsarga yogya vastu antara upalambhena vinā upalabdhi kāraṇa sākalya niścayaḥ sti
iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ

original: acirapravṛttatattadviṣayānubhavakalpitasya tadaiva dhvaṃsānāśaṅkanāt karaṇasya kāraṇasākalyaniścayaḥ kim ekajñānasaṃsargitayā iti cet na ,

tat etat āśaṅkya āha

original: ālokapuñjo yadyapi piśācād vyatirikto yadyapi ca āloko 'sti apiśācātmā ityetāvat siddhyati tathāpi atra piśāco nāsti ityetat aśakyam adhyavasātum

ghaṭaḥ hi āloka pūra madhye asaṃbhāvyaḥ

analyzed: piśācaḥ tu tādṛś svabhāvaḥ yaḥ bhū tala madhye āloka madhye vā bhavan bhū talasya ālokasya vā tām nibiḍa tām na vihanti

analyzed: tatas ca yadi api ālokaḥ tatas nyaḥ iti anena pathā niṣiddhaḥ piśācaḥ tathā api sarva prakāreṇa

original: tat ato 'numīyate ---- tat prācyaṃ rajatajñānam apramāṇam iti ,

original: ata eva diṣṭiprasthapalādipramāṇaparimāṇonmānarūpaṃ tatra antargataṃ vā aṇumahadādi saṃkhyāpṛthaktvādi ca yat tat sarvaṃ saṃbandhasyaiva vijṛmbhitam
analyzed: atas eva diṣṭi prastha pala ādi pramāṇa parimāṇa unmāna rūpam tatra antargatam vā aṇu mahat ādi saṃkhyā pṛthaktva ādi ca yat tat sarvam saṃbandhasya eva vijṛmbhitam

original: ye 'pi sāmānyādi vastvantaram amaṃsata te 'pi tatra samavāyam abhyupajagmuḥ jīvitatvena ,
analyzed: ye pi sāmānya ādi vastu antaram amaṃsata te pi tatra samavāyam abhyupajagmuḥ jīvita tvena

original: samavāyaśca saṃbandhātmā tadanugrāhyo vā keṣāṃcit , yata āhuḥ ----
analyzed: samavāyaḥ ca saṃbandha ātmā tad anugrāhyaḥ vā keṣāṃcid yatas āhuḥ
samavāya ākhyām tām śaktim anugṛhṇāti saṃbandhaḥ
iti
yat api ca kārakam tat api kriyā mukha prekṣi
sā api kālam prāṇeśvaram āśrayati

original: so 'pi kriyādvāreṇa sarvabhāvātmā sambandham uddhurayati iti saṃbandhādhīnaiva iyaṃ citrā lokayātrā /
analyzed: saḥ pi kriyā dvāreṇa sarva bhāva ātmā sambandham uddhurayati iti saṃbandha adhīnā eva iyam citrā lokayātrā
yat āha ācāryaḥ eva
lokayātrā ākṛtiḥ yasya sva icchayā naumi tam śivam
iti
atas saṃbandham eva prathamam nirūpayitum āha
anyonya anvaya rūpa aikya yujaḥ saṃbandha dhī padam

original: rājā puruṣaśca bahistaṭasthau svātmaikaparisamāptau pramātṛbhūmau yadaikyaṃ gacchataḥ ,
analyzed: rājā puruṣaḥ ca bahis taṭasthau sva ātma eka parisamāptau pramātṛ bhūmau yadā aikyam gacchataḥ
na ca aikya mātram tayoḥ bheda vigalana āpatteḥ
api tu paraspara rūpa śleṣa ātmakam yugapad eva nimajjat unmajjat bheda abheda koṭi dvaya dolā ārohaṇa lakṣaṇam anvaya rūpam

original: tadā tāveva sambandhadhiya ālambanaṃ bhavato rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ,
analyzed: tadā tau eva sambandha dhiyaḥ ālambanam bhavataḥ rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti

original: tathāhi ---- rājā yadā pūrvaṃ dhiyā gṛhīto 'pi na svātmaviśrāntyā tuṣyati tadā rūpāntareṇa puṃsā śleṣaṃ bhajan kṛtārthībhavati ,
analyzed: tathā hi rājā yadā pūrvam dhiyā gṛhītaḥ u pi na sva ātma viśrāntyā tuṣyati tadā rūpa antareṇa puṃsā śleṣam bhajan kṛtārthībhavati
puruṣaḥ pi evam

original: sa ca eṣa rūpaśleṣa eka eva ubhayoḥ cidātmani tathā avasthānarūpaḥ pūrvapratilabdhasaṃvitpratiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: sa ca eṣa rūpa śleṣaḥ ekaḥ eva ubhayoḥ cit ātmani tathā avasthāna rūpaḥ pūrva pratilabdha saṃvid pratiṣṭhaḥ

original: tata eva adhikasaṃviśrimajjanāt anābhāsamānapṛthagbhavanalakṣaṇaḥ svātantrye viśrāmyati ,
analyzed: tatas eva adhika saṃviśri majjanāt an ābhāsamāna pṛthagbhavana lakṣaṇaḥ svātantrye viśrāmyati
iti tatra eva nirbhāsate
evam bahis anekatā
antar tu paraspara rūpa śleṣeṇa aikyam
iti saṃbandhasya rūpam
jāti dravya avabhāsānām bahis api eka rūpa tām
vyakti eka deśa bhedam ca api ālambante vikalpanāḥ

original: jātyavabhāsasya avabhāsamānarūpāyāḥ jāteḥ grāhikā yāḥ kalpanāḥ ,
analyzed: jāti avabhāsasya avabhāsamāna rūpāyāḥ jāteḥ grāhikāḥ yāḥ kalpanāḥ

original: tā na kevalaṃ saṃbandhavat antar ekarūpatāṃ bahiśca anekarūpatām ālambante ,
analyzed: tāḥ na kevalam saṃbandha vat antar eka rūpa tām bahis ca aneka rūpa tām ālambante

original: yāvad bahirapi vyaktibhedalakṣaṇam anaikyaṃ bahireva ca tadanusyūtatārūpām ekatām ālambanatvaṃ nayanti /
analyzed: yāvat bahis api vyakti bheda lakṣaṇam anaikyam bahis eva ca tad anusyūta tā rūpām ekatām ālambana tvam nayanti

original: gāvaḥ iti hi pratibhāse pṛthakkṛtā bahir vyaktayo bhānti ,
analyzed: gāvaḥ iti hi pratibhāse pṛthakkṛtāḥ bahis vyaktayaḥ bhānti
yena ca bahuvacanam

original: anuyāyi ca āsāṃ bhāti vapuḥ yata ekaprātipadikārthaparāmarśānugamaḥ ,
analyzed: anuyāyi ca āsām bhāti vapuḥ yatas eka prātipadika artha parāmarśa anugamaḥ

original: ubhayaṃ ca tad bahireva imāḥ iti aṅgulyā nirdeśāt ,
analyzed: ubhayam ca tat bahis eva imāḥ iti aṅgulyā nirdeśāt
kevalam bāhya tvam api sthite paramārtha prakāśa antarbhāve

original: iti na tatra bhedābhedau dūṣaṇaṃ citrasaṃvedana iva /
analyzed: iti na tatra bheda abhedau dūṣaṇam citra saṃvedane iva
anena dravye pi rakta a rakta ādi virodhaḥ kṛta pratividhānaḥ

original: āntaraṃ tu aikyaṃ saṃbandhadvāreṇa tadvadeva sarvatra ,
analyzed: āntaram tu aikyam saṃbandha dvāreṇa tadvat eva sarvatra

original: evam avabhāsamānasya ghaṭa iti avayavidravyasya prāhikā yāḥ kalpanāḥ tā na kevalaṃ
analyzed: evam avabhāsamānasya ghaṭaḥ iti avayavi dravyasya prāhikāḥ yāḥ kalpanāḥ tāḥ na kevalam

original: saṃbandhavat antarbahīrūpatayā ekānekaviṣayā yāvat bahirapyekaṃ niḥsaṃdhibandharūpatvena
analyzed: saṃbandha vat antar bahis rūpatayā eka aneka viṣayā yāvat bahis api ekam niḥsaṃdhi bandha rūpatvena
bhinnam ca avayava lakṣaṇa eka deśa dvāreṇa svīkurvate

original: ghaṭa iti hi niḥsandibandhanaikaghanātmā vitatarūpaśca bhāti iti //5//
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ iti hi niḥsandibandhana eka ghana ātmā vitata rūpaḥ ca bhāti iti

original: kārakāṇāṃ kartrādiśaktyādhārāṇāṃ dravyāṇāṃ ca yo 'nyonyaṃ samanvayo dṛśyate ,
analyzed: kārakāṇām kartṛ ādi śakti ādhārāṇām dravyāṇām ca yaḥ nyonyam samanvayaḥ dṛśyate
yathā mātṛ meyamānānām mithas
saḥ antar līna pramā ātmaka kriyā ādi śeṣa parāmarśa eka nimittakaḥ

original: na hi pramāparāmarśam antarvartinaṃ vihāya vastunaḥ sākṣāt anvayo 'tra saṃvedyate ,
analyzed: na hi pramā parāmarśam antar vartinam vihāya vastunaḥ sākṣāt saṃvedyate
an anyatra bhāva rūpa tā nimitta tā atra viṣaya arthaḥ

original: kārakaśaktināmapi yaḥ svāśrayaiḥ saṃbandhaḥ so'pi kriyāparāmarśanimittakaḥ ,
analyzed: kāraka śaktinām api yaḥ sva āśrayaiḥ saṃbandhaḥ saḥ api kriyā parāmarśa nimittakaḥ

original: dravyāṇāṃ ca śaktīnāṃ ca kriyayā sākaṃ sākṣāt saṃbandhaḥ iti iyaṃ kriyaiva bhagavatī etāvadvijṛmbhitaṃ saṃbandham āvirbhāvayati /
analyzed: dravyāṇām ca śaktīnām ca kriyayā sākam sākṣāt saṃbandhaḥ iti iyam kriyā eva bhagavatī etāvat vijṛmbhitam saṃbandham āvirbhāvayati

original: asmādidaṃ pūrvaṃ paraṃ dūre ityevaṃ vahirbhinnatayāparāmṛśyamānayoḥ bhāvayorantar abhedanapūrvakaṃ bhedāvamarśamadhyam abhedaviśrāntaṃ ca yat  #
analyzed: asmāt idam pūrvam param dūre iti evam vahis bhinna tayā a parāmṛśyamānayoḥ bhāvayoḥ antar a bhedana pūrvakam bheda avamarśa madhyam abheda viśrāntam ca yat
rūpam āmṛśyate tat diś iti ucyate

original: atra hi tayoḥ mukhādyavayavaviśeṣaparāmarśādaraḥ tatsaṃmukhatvaparāṅmukhatvādiniścayaḥ saṃyogasaṃyuktasaṃyogālpatādiparigrahaśca upayogī /
analyzed: atra hi tayoḥ mukha ādi avayava viśeṣa parāmarśa ādaraḥ tad saṃmukhatva parāṅmukha tva ādi niścayaḥ saṃyoga saṃyukta saṃyoga alpa tā ādi parigrahaḥ ca upayogī
kāla parāmarśasya pūrva para ādi rūpa tve janma sthiti alpa tā ādi vimarśaḥ cira kṣipra ādi rūpa tve ca

original: pakṣyati pacati apākṣīt ityādau tu saṃbhāvitasya sphuṭasya sphuṭabhūtapūrvasya ātmīyasaṃvedanaspanditaprāṇādityādikriyāntarasya phalaviśeṣasya  #
analyzed: pakṣyati pacati apākṣīt ityādau tu saṃbhāvitasya sphuṭasya sphuṭa bhūta pūrvasya ātmīya saṃvedana spandita prāṇāt ityādi kriyā antarasya phala viśeṣasya
ca odana ādeḥ parāmarśaḥ upayujyate
evam saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga prabhṛtiṣu saṃbandha rūpa tā eva vācyā
sarvathā ayam sakṣepaḥ

original: yatra padārthābhāsasya ātmaviśrāntyā saṃtoṣamapuṇyataḥ ābhāsāntaraparāmarśaviśrāntisākāṅkṣatayā svarūpapariniṣṭhā tatra saṃbandharūpataiva
analyzed: yatra padārtha ābhāsasya ātma viśrāntyā saṃtoṣam apuṇyataḥ ābhāsa antara parāmarśa viśrānti sākāṅkṣa tayā svarūpa pariniṣṭhā tatra saṃbandha rūpa tā eva
tatra api bhāva antara apekṣayā saṃbandha antaram api astu
yathā saṃkhyā ādau samavāyam manyante
na ca anavasthāḥ bhavanti api doṣāya
pūrva apara kalpa sṛṣṭi anavasthā iva

original: nahi uttarasaṃbandhasṛṣṭyā vinā pūrvasaṃbandhāvabhāse hāniḥ kācit yen mūle kṣatiḥ śaṃkyeta //6//
analyzed: nahi uttara saṃbandha sṛṣṭyā vinā pūrva saṃbandha avabhāse hāniḥ kācid yet mūle kṣatiḥ śaṃkyeta
evam sakala lokayātrā anuprāṇita kalpa analpa saṃbandha bandhurībhāvam kriyāśakti vijṛmbhā ātmakam abhidhāya
tasya sthairya upayogau pūrva sūcitau nirūpayitum āha
evam eva artha siddhiḥ syāt mātuḥ artha kriyā arthinaḥ

original: bhedābhedavatārthena tena na bhrāntir īdṛśī // Ipk_2,2.7 //
analyzed: bheda abhedavatā arthena tena na bhrāntiḥ īdṛśī
iha bhāvānām na sattā saṃbandhaḥ sattvam
na arthakriyā vastu antara tvāt

original: na tatkāritvaṃ sarvadā tadāveśādaśanāt , uktaṃ hi
analyzed: na tad kāri tvam sarvadā tad āveśāt aśanāt uktam hi
arthakriyā api sahajā nā arthānām

original: iti / tatkāritvasya ca pratyakṣānupalambhātmakānvayavyatirekagamyasya apratyakṣatve sayo'pi apratyakṣatvaprāptaḥ ,
analyzed: iti tad kāri tvasya ca pratyakṣa anupalambha ātmaka anvaya vyatireka gamyasya apratyakṣa tve apratyakṣa tva prāptaḥ
na artha kriyā karaṇa yogya tvam tasya satya asatyake niścaya kāle duravadhāra tvāt
sarvasya ca asya agra kāśamāna tvena nara śṛṅga prāya tvam
artha kriyā antara paryeṣaṇe ca anavasthā
iti prakāśamāna tā eva an unmūkyamāna tathā ucita vimarśa parispandā bhāvasya sattvam
sā ca bheda abheda vapuṣām saṃbandha ādīnām asti
iti nirāśaṅkam eva satya tvam eva eṣām

original: tathāpi yadi paro'nubadhnīyāt ---- iha lokaḥ prācuryeṇa arthakriyārthī tatkāriṇi satyatvaṃ vyavaharati ,
analyzed: tathā api yadi paronubadhnīyāt iha lokaḥ prācuryeṇa arthakriyā arthī tad kāriṇi satya tvam vyavaharati
tat kim saṃbandha ādīnām asti iti
tat asya hṛdayam āśvāsyate

original: yadi na kupyasi tat sarvatraiva vyavahāre yatrāpi sphuṭā saṃbandhādidhīḥ na udeti eṣameva tatrāpi ,
analyzed: yadi na kupyasi tat sarvatra eva vyavahāre yatra api sphuṭā saṃbandha ādi dhīḥ na udeti tatra api

original: iti saṃbandhādirūpatayā bhedābhedavān yo 'rthaḥ tenaiva athakriyā ,
analyzed: iti saṃbandha ādi rūpa tayā bheda abhedavān yaḥ rthaḥ tena eva atha kriyā

original: na tu svātmamātraviśrāntena kācidapi kadācidapi arthakriyā ,
analyzed: na tu sva ātma mātra viśrāntena kācid api kadācid api arthakriyā
tathā hi sukhena smaryamāṇena abhilāṣaḥ

original: ityādi krameṇa sarvo vyavahāraḥ sukhābhāsaśca yo'nubhūtaḥ sa eva abhilaṣyate na tu anyo'nanubhūtaḥ ,
analyzed: ityādi krameṇa sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ sukha ābhāsaḥ ca yaḥ nubhūtaḥ saḥ eva abhilaṣyate na tu anyaḥ ananubhūtaḥ

original: sa eva abhilaṣyate na tu anyo'nanubhūtaḥ ,
analyzed: saḥ eva abhilaṣyate na tu anyonanubhūtaḥ

original: sa eva ca yadi prāpyate tadabhilaṣitaṃ prāptam iti tuṣyate yadi ca tat tadeva tarhi kim abhilaṣyate ---- prāptatvāt ,
analyzed: saḥ eva ca yadi prāpyate tad abhilaṣitam prāptam iti tuṣyate yadi ca tat tat eva tarhi kim abhilaṣyate prāpta tvāt

original: atha atadeva tathāpi katham arthyate ---- ajñātatvāt ,
analyzed: atha a tat eva tathā api katham arthyate ajñāta tvāt

original: tasmāt etat evaṃ bhavati ---- yadi tadeva ca atadeva ca tadapi ca atadapi ca iti /
analyzed: tasmāt etat evam bhavati yadi tat eva ca a tat eva ca tat api ca a tat api ca iti
evam sukha sādhaneṣu vācyam
tat uktam ācāryeṇa eva
iṣṭa arthitāyām iṣṭam vā vimṛśyeta iṣṭa kāri vā
na ca api adṛṣṭam iṣṭam dyauḥ api iṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhoga bhūḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ ca saha dṛṣ.yaiva vinaṣṭamiti kārthitā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam ca saha dṛṣyā eva vinaṣṭam iti kā arthitā
draṣṭṛ aikyena vibhṛṣṭam tat

original: ityādi / evaṃ ca ābhāsātmani asmin asaṃvedyamapi ābhāsāntaraṃ sāmānyasaṃbandharūpatayā anupraviṣṭam ,
analyzed: ityādi evam ca ābhāsa ātmani asmin asaṃvedyam api ābhāsa antaram sāmānya saṃbandha rūpatayā anupraviṣṭam

original: anyathā na kathaṃcidvyavahāraḥ iti sakaladeśakāladaśāpuruṣopayogī yadi ayaṃ vyavahāro na satyaḥ tarhi na anyasya satyatvaṃ vidmaḥ ---- iti  #
analyzed: anyathā na kathaṃcid vyavahāraḥ iti sakala deśa kāla daśā puruṣa upayogī yadi ayam vyavahāraḥ na satyaḥ tarhi na anyasya satya tvam vidmaḥ iti
na atra bhrāntiḥ iti bhramitavyam
iti śivam āditas
iti śrīmat ācārya utpaladeva pāda viracitāyām īśvarapratyabhijñāyām śrīmat ācārya abhinavagupta pāda kṛta vimarśinī ākhya ṭīkā upetāyām
kriyā adhikāre bhedābhedāvamarśanam nāma dvitīyam āhnikam
kriyā adhikāre tṛtīyam āhnikam

original: yasya vaktrāvalokīni prameye taṃ stumaḥ śivam //1//}
analyzed: yasya vaktra avalokīni prameye tam stumaḥ śivam

original: evaṃ kriyāśaktivisphāranirūpaṇaprasaṅgena saṃbandhapuraḥsaraṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ tattvam upapāditam ,
analyzed: evam kriyāśakti visphāra nirūpaṇa prasaṅgena saṃbandha puraḥsaram sāmānya ādīnām tattvam upapāditam
adhunā tu saṃbandha tattvam eva eka ghana tayā vyutpādanīyam

original: tacca dvividhameva paramārthataḥ jñāpyajñāpakatā kāryakāraṇatā ca ,
analyzed: tat ca dvividham eva paramārthataḥ jñāpya jñāpaka tā kārya kāraṇa tā ca

original: tatra pūrvasyāṃ mānameyabhāvādicintāspadabhūtāyāṃ sarvam uktacaraṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca āyattaṃ ---- pramāṇādhīnā vastusiddhiḥ iti tatra tatra prasiddheḥ
analyzed: tatra pūrvasyām māna meya bhāva ādi cintā āspada bhūtāyām sarvam uktacaram vakṣyamāṇam ca āyattam pramāṇa adhīnā vastu siddhiḥ iti tatra tatra prasiddheḥ

original: evaṃ ca prakṛtasamarthanīyavastūpayogitayā svayaṃ ca saṃbandha rūpatayā avaśyavicāryāṃ mānādisthitiṃ nirūpayitum
analyzed: evam ca prakṛta samarthanīya vastu upayogi tayā svayam ca saṃbandha rūpa tayā avaśya vicāryām māna ādi sthitim nirūpayitum
idam etādṛś
ityādi
īśa ādi vyavahāraḥ pravartyate
ityantam śloka saptadaśakena āhnika antaram ārabhyate
tatra śloka dvayena pramāṇa tad phala svarūpam

original: tataḥ prameyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpayituṃ pratyābhāsaṃ pramāṇasya vyāpāro na tu svalakṣaṇātmakavastvekaniṣṭhatāniyamena ---- iti darśayituṃ pratyavamarśabalena  #
analyzed: tatas prameyasya svarūpam nirūpayitum prati ābhāsam pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ na tu sva lakṣaṇa ātmaka vastu eka niṣṭha tā niyamena iti darśayitum pratyavamarśa balena
ābhāsa vyavasthā
iti daśabhiḥ ślokaiḥ ucyate
tad prasaṃgāt mithyājñāna svarūpam ślokena
prameya sva rūpa siddhiḥ ca prakṛtam api īśvara vādam ava
ambya ghaṭate iti ślokena upadarśyate

original: sa ca eṣa sarvaḥ pramāṇatatphalaprameyādipravibhāgaḥ sati pramātari pradarśitarūpe ,
analyzed: sa ca eṣa sarvaḥ pramāṇa tad phala prameya ādi pravibhāgaḥ sati pramātari pradarśita rūpe

original: tato na tasya prameyatā yena atrāpi pramāṇavyāpārasaṃbhavaḥ ,
analyzed: tatas na tasya prameya tā yena atrā api pramāṇa vyāpāra saṃbhavaḥ
kevalam vyavahāra mātra siddhi phalam pramāṇam atra
iti śloka trayeṇa iti tātparyārthaḥ
yat uktam kriyā saṃbandha ādi buddhayaḥ na bhrānti svabhāvāḥ iti
tat eva nirṇetum pramāṇa tad phala svarūpam tāvat prasiddham anuvadati
idam etādṛś iti evam yat vaśāt vyavatiṣṭhate

original: vastu pramāṇaṃ tat so 'pi svābhāso 'bhinavodayaḥ // Ipk_2,3.1 //
analyzed: vastu pramāṇam tat saḥ su ābhāsaḥ bhinava udayaḥ
saḥ ntar tathā vimarśa ātmā deśa kāla ādi abhedini
eka abhidhāna viṣaye mitiḥ vastuni abādhitā
yasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt

original: vastu nīlasukhādikaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate ---- niyatāṃ prakāśamaryādāṃ na ativartate idamiti svarūpeṇa etādṛk iti ca viśeṣaṇabhūtanityatvānityatvādiyogena
analyzed: vastu nīla sukha ādikam vyavatiṣṭhate niyatām prakāśa maryādām na ativartate idam iti sva rūpeṇa etādṛś iti ca viśeṣaṇa bhūta nitya tva anitya tva ādi yogena
tat loke pramāṇam iti sthitam

original: mama nīlaṃ prakāśate caitrasya veti ca tadā kathamavabhāsaḥ ,

original: nīlaṃ ca ittham tato vyatirekābhāsayogyaṃ yadi so'pyā ---- bhāso mahataḥ prakāśāt vyatiricyate ,

original: iti nūnaṃ tena saṃkoca ātmani nirbhāsanīyaḥ ,

original: tat paripūrṇaparapratipattikāri paramārthataḥ sakalameva śāstraṃ parārthānumānam āgamavyatiriktaṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasākṣapādena nirūpitam /

original: iha parameśvarasyedameva paraṃ svātantryaṃ ---- yat asmādṛkprācyapaśudaśāviśeṣāsaṃbhāvyamānātiduṣkaravastusaṃpādanaṃ nāma /
analyzed: iha parameśvarasya idam eva param svātantryam  yat asmādṛś prācya paśu daśā viśeṣa a saṃbhāvyamāna ati duṣkara vastu saṃpādanam nāma
itas ca kim ati duṣkaram bhaviṣyati

original: ---- yatprakāśātmani akhaṇḍitatādrūpye eva prakāśamāne prakāśananiṣadhāvabhāsaḥ prakāśamānaḥ /

original: tasmāt parameśvarasya tatparaṃ svātantryaṃ yat tathānavabhāsanaṃ paśurūpatāvabhāsanaṃ nāma grāhakāṃśasamutthāpanaṃ taddvāreṇa ca grāhyollāsanamapi

sā eṣā bhagavataḥ māyā śaktiḥ ucyate yathā uktam

original: iti / tadevaṃbhūtānmāyāśaktirūpāt svātantryāt yā mūḍhatā vinaṣṭapūrṇacetanatā svātmavartina icchāspandodayasphuṭasphuritaviśvabhāvanirbharatātmanaḥ  #

smṛti ādi śakti ātmanaḥ svātantryasya

original: etena śaktīnām icchājñānakriyāṇāṃ prakāśakena pratyabhijñārūpeṇa vyavahārasādhanaparārthānumānātmanā śāstreṇa taṃ vyavahāraṃ pravartayatāṃ  #
analyzed: etena śaktīnām icchā jñāna kriyāṇām prakāśakena pratyabhijñā rūpeṇa vyavahāra sādhana parārtha anumāna ātmanā śāstreṇa tam vyavahāram pravartayatām

kevalam iti na tu kiṃcid apūrvam kriyate

original: prakāśamāna eva yat na prakāśate ityabhimananaṃ tadapasāryate /

tad apasaraṇam eva hi parameśvara tā alābhaḥ muktiḥ
tad an apasaraṇam eva saṃsāraḥ
abhimanana mātra sāram hi etat dvayam
