analyzed: evam tattva rāśau nirṇīte etad antarbhāvena ultam api mukhya tayā nirṇetavyam pramātṛ tattvam

original: vitatya nirṇetuṃ tatraitanmātṛtāmātra ityādi vyānoviśvātmakaḥ paraḥ ityantairviṃśatiślokairāhnikāntaraṃ prastūyate /
analyzed: vitatya nirṇetum tatra etat mātṛ tā mātraḥ ityādi vyānaḥ viśva ātmakaḥ paraḥ iti antaiḥ viṃśati ślokaiḥ āhnika antaram prastūyate
tathā hi pramātuḥ atra svarūpa pratyabhijñānam upadiśyate śāstre

original: sa hi heyamupādeyaṃ ca svaṃ svabhāvaṃ vidvān paramopādeyarūpaṃ śivasvabhāvaṃ svātmānamabhedenāviśan jīvanneva mukto bhavati , ---- iti /
analyzed: sa hi heyam upādeyam ca svam svabhāvam vidvān parama upādeya rūpam śiva svabhāvam sva ātmānam abhedena āviśan jīvan eva muktaḥ bhavati iti
tatra ślokena brahma ādi traya svarūpam
ca pramātṛ bhedam śloka saptakena
śloka pañcakena pramātuḥ eva suṣupta ādi avasthāḥ
trayeṇa tāsām heya upādeya vibhāgam nirūpayati
grantha arthaḥ tu nirūpyate
tatra etat mātṛ tā mātra sthitau rudra udhi daivatam
bhinna prameya prasare brahma viṣṇū vyavasthitau

original: tatreti , evaṃbhūte 'sminnāgamasiddhe yuktyanugate ca tattvasvarūpe sati yadetat kālādipañcakaveṣṭitaṃ pramātṛtārūpam ,
analyzed: tatra iti evaṃbhūte smin āgama siddhe yukti anugate ca tattva svarūpe sati yat etat kāla ādi pañcaka veṣṭitam pramātṛ tā rūpam

original: tadeva yasyāṃ śuddhamupasaṃhṛtaprameyajātaṃ bhavati daśāyāṃ saṃhārākhyāyāṃ tasyāmadhiṣṭhātṛdevatātvaṃ
analyzed: tat eva yasyām śuddham upasaṃhṛta prameya jātam bhavati daśāyām saṃhāra ākhyāyām tasyām adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā tvam
tad daśā saṃpādanena sva upāsaka lokasya tad daśā dhyāna āveśa samāpannasya sva ābhimukhya saṃpādanena

original: ca bhajamāno bhaṭṭāraka īśvara eva rudro bhagavān ,
analyzed: ca bhajamānaḥ bhaṭṭārakaḥ īśvaraḥ eva rudraḥ bhagavān
yaḥ māyā pade pi prāṇa apāna ātmaka dharma adharma sūrya indu dina niśā ādi vimukta madhyamajyotī rūpa pramātṛ svarūpa sparśāt unmīlita tṛtīya netraḥ

original: bhinnasya tu prameye tatsaṃtānapravahaṇalakṣaṇe prasare 'dhiṣṭhātṛdevatā viṣṇuḥ ,
analyzed: bhinnasya tu prameye tad saṃtāna pravahaṇa lakṣaṇe prasare dhiṣṭhātṛdevatā viṣṇuḥ

original: ata eva tayoḥ prameyaprasararūpasya idaṃ nīlam ityevaṃ prakāśātmanaḥ prādhānyāt aham iti pramātṛdaśāveśaśūnyatvāt na tṛtīyanetronmīlanam /
analyzed: atas eva tayoḥ prameya prasara rūpasya idam nīlam iti evam prakāśa ātmanaḥ prādhānyāt aham iti pramātṛ daśā āveśa śūnya tvāt na tṛtīya netra unmīlanam
devatā eva daivatam
prasaraḥ utpattiḥ saṃtānaḥ ca

original: yadetanmātṛtāmātramuktaṃ tasya vibhāgamāgamikaṃ ca saṃjñābhedaṃ nirūpayati /
analyzed: yat etat mātṛ tā mātram uktam tasya vibhāgam āgamikam ca saṃjñā bhedam nirūpayati
eṣa pramātā māyā andhaḥ saṃsārī karma bandhanaḥ
vidyā abhijñāpita aiśvaryaḥ cidghanaḥ muktaḥ ucyate
sva aṅga rūpeṣu bhāveṣu pramātā kathyate patiḥ
māyātaḥ bhediṣu kleśa karma ādi kaluṣaḥ paśuḥ
māyayā andhaḥ vimohitaḥ

original: ata eva karmāṇi svātmano bandhakānyabhimanyamāna eṣa iti kālādiveṣṭitaḥ śūnyādipramātā saṃsarati ,
analyzed: atas eva karmāṇi sva ātmanaḥ bandhakāni abhimanyamānaḥ eṣaḥ iti kāla ādi veṣṭitaḥ śūnya ādi pramātā saṃsarati
iti atas saṃsārī
dehaḥ hi sva rūpa sādṛśyam bālya yauvana ādiṣu anuvartayan saṃsarati iva
buddhi ādeḥ tu janma antare pi saṃsaraṇam

original: vidyayā tu svarūpaprakāśanaśaktyā pratyabhijñāpadaṃ prāpitamaiśvarayaṃ yasya ,
analyzed: vidyayā tu sva rūpa prakāśana śaktyā pratyabhijñā padam prāpitam aiśvarayam yasya

original: ata eva śarīrādyapi viśvamapi ca saṃvedanamevābhimanyamāno'ta eva cideva ghanā anvācidrūpavyāmiśraṇaśūnyā yasya rūpam ,
analyzed: atas eva śarīra ādi api viśvam api ca saṃvedanam eva abhimanyamānā uta eva cit eva ghanāḥ yasya rūpam

original: sa punarjanmabandhavirahāt dehe 'pi sthite mukta iti vyapadeśayogyaḥ /
analyzed: sa punar janma bandha virahāt dehe sthite muktaḥ iti vyapadeśa yogyaḥ

original: patite tu śiva ekaghanaḥ iti kaḥ kuto muktaḥ /
analyzed: patite tu śivaḥ eka ghanaḥ iti kaḥ kutas muktaḥ
bhūta pūrva gatyā tu pramātṛ antara apekṣayā muktaḥ śivaḥ
iti vyavahāraḥ

original: yaścāsau muktaḥ sa bhāvān svāṅgavadabhimanyamānaḥ pramimīte iti sa teṣāṃ svāmī ,
analyzed: yaḥ ca asau muktaḥ sa bhāvān sva aṅga vat abhimanyamānaḥ pramimīte iti sa teṣām svāmī
sva rūpa parama artha samarpaṇāt ca pālakaḥ iti patiḥ upadiṣṭaḥ śāstre

original: māyāśaktikṛtabhedān vyatiriktāneva sato yadā mimīte tadā taireva meyaiḥ pāśarūpaiḥ pāśitaḥ iti paśuruktaḥ /
analyzed: māyā śakti kṛta bhedān vyatiriktān eva sataḥ yadā mimīte tadā taiḥ eva meyaiḥ pāśa rūpaiḥ pāśitaḥ iti paśuḥ uktaḥ
tathā hi vedya rāśi vaśāt eva asmāvi dyā asmitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśa ādayaḥ kleśāḥ
dharma adharma ādi rūpāṇi karmāṇi
ādi padāt āśaya rūpā vāsanā
phala bhoga rūpaḥ vipākaḥ
iti kāluṣyam ananta prakāram
yatas pāśita tvāt paśuḥ iti uktaḥ
yat eva etat paśu rūpam tat eva āgameṣu trividham malam iti āha
svātantrya hāniḥ bodhasya svātantryasya api abodha tā
dvidhā āṇavam malam idam sva svarūpa apahānitaḥ
bhinna vedya prathā atrā eva māyā ākhyam janma bhoga dam

original: kartaryabodhe kārmaṃ tu māyāśaktyaiva tattrayam // Ipk_3,2.5 //
analyzed: kartari abodhe kārmam tu māyā śaktyā eva tat trayam
iha jñātṛ kartṛ rūpam tāvat cit tattvasya svarūpam

original: tasyāpahāro nāmāṇavaṃ malaṃ yenāsāvaṇuḥ saṃkucito jātaḥ /
analyzed: tasya apahāraḥ nāma āṇavam malam yena asau aṇuḥ saṃkucitaḥ jātaḥ
tatra sva rūpasya nimīlanam saṃkocaḥ

original: tatsthite bodharūpe kartṛtvalakṣaṇasya svātantryātmanaḥ svarūpāntarasya nimīlanaṃ viparyayo vā ,
analyzed: tat sthite bodha rūpe kartṛ tva lakṣaṇasya svātantrya ātmanaḥ svarūpa antarasya nimīlanam viparyayaḥ vā
iti ubhayayā api āṇavam malam svarūpa apahāni rūpam ekam eva

original: atraiveti , satyāṇave male dviprakāre svarūpasaṃkoce vṛtte bhinnasya yatprathanaṃ tasya māyīyam iti saṃjñāmātram /
analyzed: atra eva iti satya āṇave male dvi prakāre sva rūpa saṃkoce vṛtte bhinnasya yat prathanam tasya māyīyam iti saṃjñā mātram
māyā kṛta tvena māyīya tā mala trayasya api

original: tatra karturabodharūpasya dehāderbhinnavedyaprathane sati dharmādharmarūpaṃ kārmaṃ malam ,
analyzed: tatra kartuḥ abodha rūpasya deha ādeḥ bhinna vedya prathane sati dharma adharma rūpam kārmam malam

original: yato janma bhogaśca sa ca niyatāvadhikaḥ ,
analyzed: yatas janma bhogaḥ ca sa ca niyatau adhikaḥ
iti jāti āyuḥ bhoga phalam karma iti uktam bhavati

original: athaiṣāṃ malānāṃ viviktaviṣayanirūpaṇāt svarūpaṃ sphuṭīkartuṃ svātanryahānirbodhasya ityasya tāvadviṣayamāha /
analyzed: atha eṣām malānām vivikta viṣaya nirūpaṇāt svarūpam sphuṭīkartum svātanrya hāniḥ bodhasya iti asya tāvat viṣayam āha
śuddha bodha ātmaka tve pi yeṣām nā uttama kartṛ tā

original: nirmitāḥ svātmano bhinnā bhartrā te kartṛtātyayāt // Ipk_3,2.6 //
analyzed: nirmitāḥ sva ātmanaḥ bhinnāḥ bhartrā te kartṛtā atyayāt

original: yeṣāṃ cinmātrameva paramārtho na tu aham iti svātmaviśrāntyānandarūpaṃ pramaṃ svātantryam /
analyzed: yeṣām cit mātram eva paramārthaḥ na tu aham iti sva ātma viśrānti ānanda rūpam pramam svātantryam

original: te parmeśvareṇa tayā nirmitāḥ svātmanaḥ sakāśādvyatiriktāḥ /
analyzed: te parmeśvareṇa tayā nirmitāḥ sva ātmanaḥ sakāśāt vyatiriktāḥ

original: atra hetuḥ ---- kartṛtāyā uttamasvātanryalakṣaṇāyā atyayāt abhāvāt ;
analyzed: atra hetuḥ kartṛ tāyāḥ uttama svātanrya lakṣaṇāyāḥ atyayāt abhāvāt
iti abhiprāya śeṣaḥ

original: nanvasmāddhetorbhavatu parameśvarāt teṣāṃ bhinnatvamanyonyatastu kathaṃ bhedo bodharūpasya vyāpitvanityatvakṛtasya ca deśakālābhedasya samābatvāt
analyzed: nanu asmāt hetoḥ bhavatu parameśvarāt teṣām bhinna tvam anyonyataḥ tu katham bhedaḥ bodha rūpasya vyāpi tva nitya tva kṛtasya ca deśa kāla abhedasya

original: anyonyabhedābhāve ca nirmitāste iti kathaṃ bahuvacanam ?
analyzed: anyonya bheda abhāve ca nirmitāḥ te iti katham bahuvacanam
iti āśaṅkām vyapohati
bodha eka lakṣaṇa aikye pi teṣām anyonya bhinna tā
tathā īśvara icchā bhedena te ca vijñāna kevalāḥ

original: iha hi sarvatrāpratihataśaktiḥ parameśvara eva tayābubhūsaṃstathā tathā bhavati ,
analyzed: iha hi sarvatra apratihata śaktiḥ parameśvaraḥ eva tayā abubhūsan tathā tathā bhavati
na tu anyaḥ kaścid sti
iti asakṛt uktam
tatas ca vyā viśeṣeṇa teṣām śarīra ādi śūnya anta pramātṛ pada uttīrṇānām bodha tva nitya tva vibhu tva ādi dharma jātasya aikye pi anyonyam bhedaḥ
te ca śāstre vijñāna kevalāḥ uktāḥ
tatra vijñāma kevalaḥ mala eka yuktaḥ

original: ---- ityādau vijñānaṃ bodhātmakaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ svātantryavirahitameṣāmiti //7//
analyzed: ityādau vijñānam bodha ātmakam rūpam kevalam svātantrya virahitam eṣām iti

original: evaṃ svātantryahānirbodhasya ityasya bhāgasya vijñānākalaviṣayatāmuktvā svātantryasyāpyabodhatā ityamumaṃśaṃ viṣayapradarśanena spaṣṭayati
analyzed: evam svātantrya hāniḥ bodhasya iti asya bhāgasya vijñānākala viṣaya tām uktvā svātantryasya api abodha tā iti amum aṃśam viṣaya pradarśanena spaṣṭayati
śūnya ādi a bodha rūpāḥ tu kartāraḥ pralayākalāḥ

original: teṣāṃ kārmo malo'pyasti māyīyastu vikalpitaḥ // Ipk_3,2.8 //
analyzed: teṣām kārmaḥ mala upi asti māyīyaḥ tu vikalpitaḥ
śūnye eva

original: yadi vā prāṇe buddhau vā yeṣāṃ ahamiti camatkārayogāt kartṛtvaṃ te pralayena kṛtāḥ akalāḥ kalātattvopalakṣitakaraṇakāryarahitā abodharūpāḥ
analyzed: yadi vā prāṇe buddhau vā yeṣām aham iti camatkāra yogāt kartṛ tvam te pralayena kṛtāḥ akalāḥ kalā tattva upalakṣita karaṇa kārya rahitāḥ abodha rūpāḥ

original: pralayāvadhi hi te tathākṛtāḥ uttarakālaṃ tu kāryakaraṇasaṃbaddhā eva bhavanti ;
analyzed: pralaya avadhi hi te tathākṛtāḥ uttara kālam tu kārya karaṇa saṃbaddhāḥ eva bhavanti
yatas teṣām na kevalam ukta rūpaḥ ā

original: ava eva malo yāvat kārmo 'pi vāsanāsaṃskārarūpo dharmādharmātmāstyeva /
analyzed: avaḥ eva malaḥ yāvat vāsanā saṃskāra rūpaḥ dharma adharma ātmā asti eva
yadi evam bhinna vedya prathāpya eṣām syāt
satyam sa vedye suṣupta pade
tu na bhavati

original: tena māyīyo mala eṣāṃ vikalpito vyavasthitaviṣayatvena /
analyzed: tena māyīyaḥ malaḥ eṣām vikalpitaḥ vyavasthita viṣaya tvena

original: tathā hi ---- ke'pi śūnyādibhāgaviśrāntā gāḍanidrājaḍīkṛtā apavedyasuṣuptapadabhājaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi ke pi śūnya ādi bhāga viśrāntāḥ gāḍa nidrā jaḍīkṛtāḥ apavedya suṣupta pada bhājaḥ
anye tu buddhi ādi niṣṭhāḥ sukha duḥkha avaśeṣa sāmānya ātmaka bhinna vedya saṃvedana yogitaḥ sa vedya sauṣupta pada līnāḥ
sthūla deha indriya ātmaka kārya karaṇa viyoga rūpa tvam tu pralayākala lakṣaṇam sarveṣām
evam svātantryasya api abodhatā iti evam aṃśaḥ sphuṭīkṛtaḥ
prasaṅgāt ca kārma malasya viṣayaḥ darśitaḥ
māyā malasya ca pākṣika tvam uktam

original: adhunā punarāṇavakārmamaladvayābhāve'pi śuddho'sti māyākhyasya malasya viṣayaḥ ,
analyzed: adhunā punar āṇavaka arma mala dvaya abhāve pi śuddhaḥ asti māyā ākhyasya malasya viṣayaḥ
iti darśayati
bodhānām api kartṛ tva juṣām kārmam alakṣatau
bhinna vedya juṣām māyā amalaḥ vidyeśvarāḥ ca te

original: ye cinmātramevātmatayā paśyanti aham iti ca camatkārollāsāt kartārastata eva sarvajñāḥ sarvakartāraśca te vidyeśvarāḥ /
analyzed: ye cit mātram eva ātma tayā paśyanti aham iti ca camatkāra ullāsāt kartāraḥ tatas eva sarvajñāḥ sarva kartāraḥ ca te vidyeśvarāḥ

original: kintu tanukaraṇabhuvanādi yadeṣāṃ vedyatayā kāryatayā ca bhāti,
analyzed: kintu tanu karaṇa bhuvana ādi yat eṣām vedya tayā kārya tayā ca bhāti
tat kuvinda paṭa dṛṣṭyā bhinnam eva sat
iti asti vidye śvarāṇām māyā ākhya mala yogaḥ

original: atha malatrayasyāpi yaugapadyena yo viṣayastaṃ darśayitumāha /
analyzed: atha mala trayasya api yaugapadyena yaḥ viṣayaḥ tam darśayitum āha

original: devādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavināṃ trividhaṃ malam /
analyzed: deva ādīnām ca sarveṣām bhavinām trividham malam
tatra api kārmam eva ekam mukhyam saṃsāra kāraṇam
iha vidyeśvara vijñānā kalāḥ tāvat na bhavinaḥ māyā anta adhva atikramaṇāt
pralayākalāḥ api kaṃcid kālam avidyamāna bhavāḥ

original: ye tvete māyātattvāntarālaparivartino devādayaḥ sthāvarāntāśvaturdaśa śāstreṣu parigaṇitāste sarve bhavinaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ ,
analyzed: ye tu ete māyā tattva antarāla parivartinaḥ deva ādayaḥ sthāvara anta aśva turdaśa śāstreṣu parigaṇitāḥ te sarve bhavinaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ
teṣām ca trayaḥ api yugapad malāḥ

original: nanu malatrayamadhye katamo malaḥ saṃsaraṇameṣāṃ saṃpādayet ?
analyzed: nanu mala traya madhye katamaḥ malaḥ saṃsaraṇam eṣām saṃpādayet

original: āha , tatrāpi teṣu triṣvapi satsu kārmaṃ malaṃ mukhyatayā saṃnipatya saṃsaraṇe kāraṇam . yathoktam /
analyzed: āha tatra api teṣu triṣu api satsu kārmam malam mukhya tayā saṃnipatya saṃsaraṇe kāraṇam yathā uktam
karmataḥ tu śarīrāṇi viṣayāḥ karaṇāni ca

original: iti / tanukaraṇaviṣayasaṃbandha eva ca vartamāno bhaviṣyaṃśca ,
analyzed: iti tanu karaṇa viṣaya saṃbandhaḥ eva ca vartamānaḥ bhaviṣyan ca
iti anavaratam prabandhataḥ vartamānaḥ saṃsaraṇam ucyate

original: āṇavamāyāmalau tu yadyapi na kāraṇaṃ saṃsāre ,
analyzed: āṇava māyā malau tu yadi api na kāraṇam saṃsāre
tathā api kārmeṇa vinā tau deha ādi vicitra bhāva abhinirvartana śakti śūnyau vijñānākalā ādiṣu

original: ---- iti mukhyaṃ kārmameva malaṃ saṃsārakāraṇaṃ tatra tatra śāstre gaṇyate /
analyzed: iti mukhyam kārmam eva malam saṃsāra kāraṇam tatra tatra śāstre gaṇyate
atas eva tad upakṣaye vṛtte dattaḥ tāvat a saṃsaraṇa sopāna pada bandhaḥ
iti āśayena karma bandha abhimāna parihāniḥ eva yatnataḥ sāṃkhya purāṇa bhārata ādi śāstreṣu upadiśyate
evam mala trayasya eka eka bhedaiḥ tribhiḥ dvi bhedaiḥ tribhiḥ tri bhedena ekena
iti sapta pramātāraḥ uttiṣṭhanti
tathā ca śāstre
śiva ādi sakala antāḥ ca śaktimantaḥ sapta
iti uktam tatra api avāntara bhedena guṇa mukhya tā bhedena vikalpa samuccaya tā ādi bhedena ca ananta prakāra tvam iti
asya ca mala trayasya udbhava tirobhāva bhedāt saṃsāriṇām prakāra dvayam
iti darśayati
kalā udbalitam etat ca cit tattvam kartṛ tā mayam
acit rūpasya śūnya ādeḥ mitam guṇa tayā sthitam
mukhya tvam kartṛ tāyāḥ ca bodhasya ca cit ātmanaḥ

original: etacceti , yat tridaśādīnāṃ bhavināṃ caitanyaṃ kartṛtāṃśasya prādhānyānmalena saṃvidbhāgasya nimajjitatvāt kartṛtāmayam cidrūpasya tattvaṃ
analyzed: etat ca iti yat tridaśa ādīnām bhavinām caitanyam kartṛtā aṃśasya prādhānyāt malena saṃvid bhāgasya nimajjita tvāt kartṛtā mayam cit rūpasya tattvam
kalā ākhyena parameśvara śakti ātmanā tattvena upodvalitam anuprāṇitam
malena nyakkṛtam sat udbodhitam
śūnya ādeḥ deha paryantasya māyā pramātuḥ saṃbandhi
tat guṇa tvena apradhāna tvena sthitam
yatas mitam idanta āpanna deha ādi śūnya anta prameya bhāga nimagna tvāt prameyam
yaḥ gauraḥ
yaḥ sukhī
yaḥ tṛṣitaḥ
yaḥ sarva rūpa rahitaḥ saḥ aham
iti hi idantā eva antar nīta ahaṃbhāvā saṃsāriṇām parisphurati
sā iyam jāgrat svapra suṣupta rūpā saṃsāra avasthā
yadā tu ukta guru upadeśa ādi diśā tena eva ahaṃbhāvena svātantrya ātmanā vyāpaka tva nitya tva ādi dharma parāmarśam ātmani

original: vidadhatā tataḥ śūnyādeḥ prameyādunmajjyevāsyate tadā turyātītāvasthā /
analyzed: vidadhatā tatas śūnya ādeḥ prameyāt unmajjya iva āsyate tadā turyātīta avasthā
yadā api parāmṛṣṭa tathābhūta vaibhava ādi nitya aiśvarya saṃbhedena eva ahaṃbhāvena śūnya ādi deha dhātu antam siddha rasa yogena vidhyate
tadā asyām turya daśāyām tat api prameya tām ujjhatī iva

original: seyaṃ dvayyapi jīvanmuktāvasthā samāveśa ityuktā śāstre /
analyzed: sā iyam dvayī api jīvanmukta avasthā samāveśaḥ iti uktā śāstre
samyak āveśanam eva hi tatra tatra pradhānam
tad siddhaye tu upadeśa antarāṇi
yathā gītam
mayi āveśya manaḥ ye mām gī
iti
atha āveśayitum cittam gī
ityādi ca samāveśa pallavāḥ eva ca prasiddha deha ādi pramātṛ bhāga prahvī bhāva bhāvanā anuprāṇitāḥ parameśvara stuti praṇāma pūjā dhyāna samādhi prabhṛtayaḥ
karma prapañcāḥ
yat gītam api
abhyāse pi asamarthaḥ san mad karma paramaḥ bhava gī
iti dehapāte tu parameśvaraḥ eva eka rasaḥ
iti kaḥ kutra katham samāviśet

original: tadetadāha --- yat punaḥ kartṛtāyā mukhyatvaṃ tannāntarīyakaśca śūnyāderguṇabhāvaḥ ,
analyzed: tat etat āha yat punar kartṛ tāyāḥ mukhya tvam tad nāntarīyakaḥ ca śūnya ādeḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ
tasmin ca api acit rūpe guṇībhūte svātantryasya api a bodha tā iti mala lyā pārasya apahastanāt

original: cito yaḥ paro'pyātmabhāgo bodhalakṣaṇo malena nyakkṛto'bhūt tasyāpi adhunonmagnatvena mukhyatvam /
analyzed: citaḥ yaḥ paropya ātma bhāgaḥ bodha lakṣaṇaḥ malena tasya api adhunā unmagna tvena mukhya tvam
yat ca tat kartṛ tāyāḥ mukhya tvam unmagna tā
idam eva jñānam ajñāna ātmaka mala pratipakṣa tvāt

original: tadetanmukhyatvaṃ samāveśasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena dehasthito'pi patiḥ iti muktaḥ iti śāstreṣūktaḥ //12//
analyzed: tat etat mukhya tvam samāveśasya lakṣaṇam yena deha sthitaḥ api patiḥ iti muktaḥ iti śāstreṣu uktaḥ

original: nanvevaṃ patyuḥ samāveśātmikā turyatadatītarūpā bhavatu daśā ,

paśoḥ tu katham suṣupta svapna jāgrat dṛśā abhedaḥ āgameṣu uktaḥ
iti āśaṅkya suṣupta svarūpam eva tāvat ācaṣṭe śloka trayeṇa
śūnye buddhi ādi abhāva ātmani ahantā kartṛ tā pade
asphuṭa a rūpa saṃskāra mātriṇi jñeya śūnya tā
sā akṣāṇām āntarī vṛttiḥ prāṇa ādi prerikā matā
jīvana ākhyā athavā prāṇehantā puryaṣṭaka ātmikā
tāvat mātra sthitau proktam sauṣuptam pralaya upamam
sa vedyam apavedyam ca māyā mala yuta ayutam

original: iha cittattvaṃ svasvarūpamācchādayat jñeyarūpeṇa buddhyādinā dehāntena ghaṭādinā vābhāsate /

ekam eva ca idam svātantrya vijṛmbhitam

original: na tvatra vāstavaḥ kramo vā bhedo vā /

tatra api tu svātantryāt kramaḥ ca bhedaḥ ca ābhāsate
tat evam sthite yaḥ cit tattvasya svarūpa ācchādana bhāgaḥ saḥ eva uttara bhāga antra asaṃkīrṇaḥ

original: yadā viśrāmyati tadanudayādvā tatpradhvaṃsādvā pralaya iva tadanādaraṇādvā nidrāsamādhimūrcchādāviva ,

original: tatraiva cāhantārūpaṃ kartṛtāyāḥ padaṃ parāmarśo 'sphuṭatvādarūpātmanā saṃskāreṇa śuddhena vedyapadavīmaprāptena yukto bhavati ,

svīkṛta sāmānya ākāra niṣedhyā
atas eva saṃskāra śeṣīkṛta jñeyā śūnyaḥ iti ucyate

original: iyameva hi sarvatrābhāvo na tu satāṃ sarvātmanā vināśaḥ /

taiḥ taiḥ api upayācitaiḥ upanataḥ tanvyāḥ sthitaḥ upi antike

original: kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
analyzed: kāntaḥ loka samānaḥ evam a parijñātaḥ na rantum yathā
lokasya eṣa tathā anavekṣita guṇaḥ sva ātmā api
na evā alam nija vaibhavāya tat iyam tad pratyabhijñā uditā
yadā nāyaka guṇa saṃśravaṇa pravṛddha anurāgā kāminī tad darśanam eva param upādeyam ākāṅkṣantī
divāniśam avaśa hṛdayāḥ devatā upayācitāni dūtī saṃpreṣaṇāni mada lekha dvārakā ātma avasthā nivedanāni
kurvāṇā viraha kṣāmībhavat gātra latikā tiṣṭhati

original: tadā tadupayācitavaśāt aśaṅkitameva savidhavartini priyatame'valokite taistairutkarṣaviśeṣaiḥ
analyzed: tadā tad upayācita vaśāt aśaṅkitam eva savidha vartini priyatama iva lokite taiḥ taiḥ utkarṣa viśeṣaiḥ
parāmarśa padavīm a gacchadbhiḥ jana sādhāraṇa tām āpādite saṃpannam api priyatama avalokanam
na hṛdayam pūrṇīkaroti

original: tathā svātmani viśveśvare satataṃ nirbhāsamāne'pi tannirbhāsanaṃ na hṛḍayasya pūrṇatāmādhatte ;
analyzed: tathā svātmani viśveśvare satatam nirbhāsamāne api tat nirbhāsanam na hṛḍayasya pūrṇa tām ādhatte

original: yataḥ sopyātmā viśvajñatvakartṛtvādyapratihatasvaśaktilakṣaṇapāramaiśvaryotkarṣayogena na parāmṛṣṭaḥ ---- iti bhāsamānaghaṭāditulyavṛttānto  #
analyzed: yatas saḥ upi ātmā viśvajña tva kartṛ tva ādi apratihata sva śakti lakṣaṇa pāramaiśvarya utkarṣa yogena na parāmṛṣṭaḥ iti bhāsamāna ghaṭa ādi tulya vṛttāntaḥ
jātaḥ

original: yadā tu dūtīvacanādvā tallakṣaṇābhijñānādvopāyāntarādvā tānutkarṣān hṛdayaṅgamīkaraṇenāmṛśati ,
analyzed: yadā tu dūtī vacanāt vā tad lakṣaṇa abhijñānāt vā upāya antarāt vā tān utkarṣān hṛdayaṅgamīkaraṇena āmṛśati
tadā tad kṣaṇam adbhuta phulla nyāyena eva tāvat kām api pūrṇa tām abhyeti
paribhoga abhyāsa rase tu viśrānti antarāṇi api labhate
tadvat ātmani guru vacanāt jñāna kriyā lakṣaṇa śakti abhijñāna ādeḥ vā yadā pāramaiśvarya utkarṣa hṛdayaṅgamībhāvaḥ jāyate
tadā tad lakṣaṇam eva pūrṇa tā ātmikā jīvanmuktiḥ

original: samāveśābhyāsarase tu vibhūtilābhaḥ ---- iti tasya pratyabhijñaiva parāparasiddhipradāyinī bhavati //17//
analyzed: samāveśa abhyāsa rase tu vibhūti lābhaḥ iti tasya pratyabhijñā eva para apara siddhi pradāyinī bhavati

original: sarvopakārakaṃ mahāphalamidaṃ śāstraṃ prasiddhānvayayogena nāmadheyaprasiddhyā ca
analyzed: sarva upakārakam mahā phalam idam śāstram prasiddha anvaya yogena nāmadheya prasiddhyā ca
tad utkarṣa smaraṇa dvāra janita saṃbhāvanā pratyaya lakṣaṇa pravartaka saṃvedanayā janam
praavrtayitum pituḥ nāmnā ca upasaṃhāram darśayati
janasya ayatna siddhi artham udayākara sūnunā
īśvara pratyabhijñā iyam utpalena upapāditā

original: yasya kasyacijjantoriti nātra jātyādyapekṣā kācit ---- iti sarvopakāritvamuktam /
analyzed: yasya kasyacid jantoḥ iti na atra jāti ādi apekṣā kācid iti sarva upakāri tvam uktam

original: ayatnena siddhiḥ parāpararūpā yathā syāt ---- iti mahāphalattvam /
analyzed: ayatnena siddhiḥ para apara rūpā yathā syāt iti
udayākara putraḥ śrīmān utpaladevaḥ usmad parama guruḥ idam śāstram akārṣīt iti tad prasiddyā

original: janaḥ pravartate ---- iti pravartanādvāreṇa so'nugṛhīto bhavati ---- ityubhayanāmanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: janaḥ pravartate iti pravartanā dvāreṇa saḥ anugṛhītaḥ bhavati iti ubhaya nāma nirdeśaḥ
iyam iti hṛdayaṅgama tām upapatti śataiḥ ānītā
iti śivam āditas
eṣā abhinavaguptena sūtra artha pravimarśinī
racitā pratyabhijñāyām laghvī vṛttiḥ abhaṅgurā
vākya pramāṇa pada tattva sat āgama arthāḥ sva ātma upayogam upayānti amutas sva śāstrāt

original: bhaumān rasāñjalamayāṃśca na sasyapuṣṭau muktvārkamekamiha yojayituṃ kṣamo'nyaḥ //
analyzed: bhaumān rasān jala mayān ca na sasya puṣṭau muktvā arkam ekam iha yojayitum kṣamaḥ nyaḥ
ātmānam an abhijñāya vivektum yoni at icchati

original: tena bhautena kiṃ vācyaṃ praśne'sminko bhavāniti //}
analyzed: tena bhautena kim vācyam praśne ismin kaḥ bhavān iti
iti śrīmat ācārya utpaladeva viracitāyām īśvarapratyabhijñāyām śrīmat ācārya abhinavagupta viracita vimarśinī ākhya ṭīkā upetāyām tattvasaṅgraha adhikāraḥ
samāptā śrīmat īśvarapratyabhijñā
